Love the screen resolution, sound, everything...I've only begun to play around with all that it can do, but so far...exceeds my expectations. Very glad I bought it!

I' rate it as Zero! I bought on Amazon Prime Day. I already owned an Echo Show 1st generation. I wanted the larger screen the newer Echo Show had to offer. I've been using it for over a week and the sound gave out today. NO SOUND anymore! Before the sound gave out I noticed for two days before Alexa would randomly talk on her own without anyone saying her name--very creepy. I think Amazon rolled these Echo Shows off the assembly line too quickly in order to meet the demand of Amazon Prime Day. No quality control apparently. Shame on Amazon. The first generation of Echo Show was great. This one I'm Sending it back to Amazon.

reviews.reviewTitle: I like the second generation improvements.
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my elderly father. He had the echo plus before, and that was pretty good. We can now watch family videos from YouTube and can video chat with him using the Alexa app on our phones. The speaker might be a little cleaner if it was moved to the front of the device, but sounds pretty good with some nice base.

Arrived Brand new and right out the box Alexa couldn’t respond and sound wouldn’t work. YouTube showed video of gal having similar difficulty and how she found to fix it was unplugging power cord from echo and then it would reset. We now have to do this 1x a week it seems. I am not impressed for how much it is to have this issue. Happens again and I may just return it

The Echo Show seems to work great right out of the box. Set up was easy, and it has integrated with many of my other smart home features. We haven't used it for video playback because, well, we just don't watch that much TV in the kitchen where we have our unit, but it is great for dialing into our SiriusXM channels as well as our Amazon Prime music playlists and streams.

I like the Alexa Show but this is a replacement for he one I had that was having some speaker issues with clicking. Amazon was good to replace it but this one the speaker is rumbling when playing music. Also, Alexa sometimes doesn’t respond when you ask her something and I takes us a few times to get a response.

reviews.reviewTitle: Blue tooth needs a lot of work
reviews.reviewText: System is GREAT!!!! Blue tooth is horrible, if you link it to any speakers the sound quality is horrible!!!! But if you listen to its speakers the quality is GREAT!!!! It messes up a lot but learns very quickly, you just have to spend time and have a lot of patience with it.

Omg I can’t get enough of this echo show. The speaker is amazing. It has so many options and I can’t live without mine. I love talking to my friends and family while cooking or cleaning in the kitchen as that’s where I have mine and I have it hooked up to all my speakers throughout the house and bedrooms

reviews.reviewTitle: What did I do before Echo Show?
reviews.reviewText:
I love my Echo Show. I have even said crazy things to her like, "What would I do without you." "Thank you SOOOOO much."
The ease of set up is spectacular. The things she does for me and her sound is excellent.
I'm considering purchasing another Show so I don't have to move my present one from room to room.

The sound is incredible...you can get on YouTube instantly.....im making a cg animated film and I have do a lot of modeling I have to do....i mainly use it for reference photos and music....i love the sound

I’m just not sure what to think now. Alexa’s voice is not clear. It seems loud and very muffled and spitty. (Is this a word?). I’ve adjusted the bass, treble, and mid, to no avail. Is there something amiss with just mine, or is this common?
I have the first one, and all is very clear.

I love the look of this device, it communicates well and has useful features. We keep it on a counter above the kitchen sink and getting to watch a show while doing dishes makes a boring chore less terrible! We have it hooked to security cameras in our driveway so that I can see kids outside playing while making lunch. A great investment for us!

We have three different Alexa devices along with Arlo cameras. We love these because you can drop in and communicate to another room in the house. Or if we call someone with a device that has a screen we can see them and they can see us. Alexa is full of different skills you can have her add. She seems to get smarter and smarter all the time.

I straight up love this product. It's a smart device that everyone should have in their home. We have multiple of these devices all over our home and they integrate with our smart home very very well. You get used to walking into a room and saying "Alexa, turn on the lights."

We also love playing music with the device. You can tell it to play an artist or song and it will start playing it right away.

The sound quality is exceptional. Honestly much better than we expected. And for the cost of the product, the quality of video and the screen is much much better than I expected.

I have these devices all over my home. I have them linked together so I have stereophonic sound everywhere. Love them! I move one of the Echos out to the patio when I have parties so my music plays there also. I wish there would be a weather proof Echo so I could leave it on my patio all the time

reviews.reviewTitle: Does not integrate with other Echos, otherwise, AWESOME!!!
reviews.reviewText: When you want to play your song on "everywhere", Echo Show does not support this feature. This really sucks because you get to see the lyrics and sing along, especially if you have a few echos around you for the surround sound, which would sound AMAZING with its impressive bass tone. Echo Show has some nice sound build into this baby! Hopefully soon Amazon will integrate all of the Echoes! Otherwise, LOVE IT, HAVE TWO!!!

I live alone and it’s fun to say “Good morning “ and receive a response, and maybe a joke or two, and the weather. I love to be able to obtain information about any topic. I have Amazon Music so the sound is really good when listening to any tunes.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works only once in a while.
reviews.reviewText: Very inco sistant.it will work o ce then not work. O the 6th or 7th try it will work once mor. Mostly doesnt play prime video. It says getti g ... but never does. If you pause a video for too long it completely stops playing youvideo and will not restart play. For the mo ey it is useless. They havent perfe ted this at all.

reviews.reviewTitle: A great way to stay connected to family and friends.
reviews.reviewText: I didn't realize how much I would like this device. We use it mainly to talk to our grandkids who live out of state. I plan on buying another for my other grandkids. Everyone who visits gets a kick out of it. We really like seeing the lyrics on the screen when playing music.

It sounds much better than the dot however it randomly ignores what we asked and plays a radio station on prime even tho I dont have prime. I cant find any way to disable music streaming. We badly need the option for pc to disable ALL streaming.

reviews.reviewTitle: Solid product, still needs a lot of improvement in functionality
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking and solidly built, but still exceptionally lacking in functionality. Does not easily connect to ring camera system which was the primary reason for purchase.

I bought this last October and it has been perfect for my many needs. The sound and picture quality is great. I’m glad I waited to buy this one instead of the first generation for the bigger screen. I haven’t had no issues. I’m highly satisfied.

Screen quality is superb as is the sound quality BUT... the voice recognition is atrocious and nearly drives you nuts. Steering it to play Prime Video close to drove us over the edge, not to mention it’s inability to understand what you say when you try to give it Alexa instructions :(

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo Show is Powerful and really nice
reviews.reviewText: Fast availability and delivery. Easy Setup. Can do so many things. Works great with our Ring Doorbell and Ring Floodlight. Speakers are very nice. So happy with this product had to buy another to replace the Echo Dot in my office! Serves well as a TV as well as a smart display device.

As an early adopter of echos, I already had a few around the house, but wasn’t convinced the screen would provide much benefit. We now love it, it cycles thru ‘this day’ pictures from the past years which bring a smile every morning. Like the videos for news briefing and the visual forecast for weather.

Had the first generation and loved it.
The new generation is even better as you can now stream tv apps through the Show.
Highly Recommend.

It was a gift for my wife and she loves it. We only had a dot in the past and this is well above that. The sound quality is great and picture quality is nice too. Love that you do so much with this device and alexia response very well. Only thing I don't like is that it never truly turns off.

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo Show 2nd Gen Zcreen Goes black and white with horizontal lines
reviews.reviewText: Bought 2 Echo Shows 2nd Gen for Christmas 2018. One for me and another for my elderly mother who lives 4 hrs away. Within weeks both units started having horizontal lines and the screen color would go gray during video calls. After troubleshooting with Amazon we returned the original 2 Echo Shows and received 2 new devices in a timely manner (easy return and shipping of the original Echo Show). Happy with the devices but within days my Echo Show started having the same issues as previously mentioned (no issues thus far with my mother's device). Not sure if I need to return both and call it a loss or request another replacement. As a side note, I paid $229 for each and now see Prime Members pay $179.

I purchased the generation one when they hot the market and have used it for over a year now.

The 2nd generation is quite an improvement however. The screen size is larger, sound quality is superb and camera quality seems to have been improved.

Highly recommended!
We love our Echo show! Now we can see who's at the front door from our Ring device and we can see what our kids are up to through the Wyze cam. The audio is also way better than our echo dot.

It is bigger than the original but not huge. The sound quality is better and the screen is as well. I traded my old one in and was without Alexa in my family room for 10 days. I missed her. Yeah, I know pretty sick but it is used a lot.
Hey Amazon, work on letting us pick a name of our own choosing. I would like to call mine, Hey You...

I really great upgrade from an echo. Works great and it's easy to find out what you need to know about anything. Easy smart home integration, I'm running my thermostats, alarm system, lights, and cameras with the show. So far so good, again great upgrade

I love listening to my Pandora and Amazon Prime music on this device. I haven’t watched any movies on it so far. I love the constant visual of who the artists are when I do listen. This was a great deal and so far I like everything about it👍

When the power goes out in the house, when the power comes back on the sound does not work it is a easy fix you just have to pull the power cord AT THE UNIT, not at the wall and wait 15 to 30 second then replug it back in then everything work great again

If you want a do all Alexa unit, you cannot go wrong with this. We use it everyday. Sound quality is good compared to other Echo units we have, but not as room filling as a Dot connected to home theater. Well worth the price for the flexibility it offers.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easily the best purchase of Alexa devices.
reviews.reviewText:
The Alexa Show is a great buy. I bought 2 of them to accompany the Echo,2 dots and kids dot in our home. The 2nd Show is at my mother's house so we have video drop in on her to see how she is doing. This is a very nice and easy feature,especially for video calls. I also receive to Phillip's smart light bulbs with buying the 2 Shows. I really enjoy having them easily integrated with the Alexa household.
Our when family enjoys the Show so much we are planning to upgrade to all Shows throughout the house. Compared to Dots,the sound is far superior and the microphones are much better than the Dots.

Initially I was disappointed because of poor to none wireless camera monitoring setup instructions. Thanks to perusing the "questions section" of product reviews I was able to stumble through my issue and get it working. Now I love my new Show and also really enjoy the rich sound quality it has.
This is my 6th Echo and first "Show." I really like to screen quality and speaker quality. I use it in my kitchen and it comes in handy for so many things.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice size for kitchen counter....easy setup
reviews.reviewText:
Nice size screen and decent voice recognition.

Fits nicely on the kitchen counter, and the display is good for upcoming calendar events and pictures. Easy to link to multiple calendars. Setup was a breeze. Works well with my echo clock.

Even at it's brightest setting the screen display is not as bright as a 1st generation Echo Show. Displaying the background photos with a Prime account is nothing but awkward to accomplish. It would be nice if you could just point to an Amazon Drive folder. This used to work, but later quit working when I added new photos to the folder with a 1st generation Echo Show. Now it seems you must create a Amazon Photos album with the 2nd generation Echo Show. When I used that process, it seemed like many of my photos weren't there. I thought this was going to be a great way to display my favorite photos. It has never been a smooth process.

I love that you plug it in and it works, so easy! I bought it to use as a picture frame after seeing it at my brother’s home, I just made a special folder in my Amazon pictures with all the pictures I wanted to rotate through. It is so easy! The sound is awesome too!

My echo show has no sound after 3 days. Amazon tells me that they are sending me a new AC adapter that should fix the issue. How does the electric outlet adapter effect sound. That does not even sound right.

I wasn't sure that I needed a new Alexa/Kindle type device - however, when my Echo (1st gen) started to act a bit off kilter, I thought why not! AND, I'm so glad I did - now I can watch/listen to music and movies/shows while doing work at my desk - I LOVE IT!

reviews.reviewTitle: That it has a great screen
reviews.reviewText: Love this new addition to my Echo collection. I have this one in my kitchen and live the sound it puts out but more than that the s teen. It always has the time and temperature showing. The artist and song appear and then words to all of the songs come up on the screen. I ha e learned that I’ve been singing some lyrics wrong for many years. I use the grocery list feature all of the time and when I get to the store there is my list. I haven’t begun to use all of the features but am looking forward to having it show me recipes. It was a great purchase

Sorta like there was a party going on in a dark room...and then the lights got turned on. An excellent addition to the Echo family. Quality and performance are superb. The 2nd Gen Show sound is as good or better than the original. Image quality great. And processing performance very good. Tried the Show to Show calling at 240 miles distance and it performed well. Got me all fired up to enable and include my automation and IoT devices - which gathered my devices under one umbrella - added programming features - and prompted me to add new devices. Great product. Anxious to get my hands on an Echo Auto.

I love it!!!!!!! Wow it's a great sounding system for everything in stereo I am so happy I got this I use it for everything and my new camera is on the app plus I can see 360 degrees around my house oh man thank you so much this is the best thing I bought this year!

reviews.reviewTitle: Improvements on everything!!!... but addition of random cloth backing
reviews.reviewText:
The sound is much better. The screen is much better. The material on the back of this device is like some dust accumulating magnet. Wiping it makes it worse.. if I didn't love Alexa's sweet sweet voice so much I'd be upset.

Screen size is massive and crisp. The audio has a much deeper sound. I'm impressed...

Unfortunately, mine is not working. I keep having issues with touch sensitivity. Besides that, while watching videos or streaming music, it will stop in the middle, without prior notice. Very disappointed.

Update:

Amazon backs their products with full responsibility. All issues resolved.
Very nice I love the bigger screen and the sound is nice all in all I love it
I bought the Echo Show as a gift for my dad and his girlfriend and they love it! I have the Echo Dot, so we video call each other now. It’s pretty awesome.

I got this with a bundle when I bought my phone. Didnt think I would use it much but it has been a handy piece of equipment. You can do about anything on them from listening to music to having Alexa give you step by step recipe instructions. The speaker is awesome. Havent used for controlling things in the house like lights, thermostat, security alarms, etc.

reviews.reviewTitle: LOVE LOVE LOVE MY Alexa Show.
reviews.reviewText: I get pretty excited when I get a new toy, but I have to tell you that this is buy far the best ever. Alexa does anything with in her limits that I ask of her. She'll even add for me. Answer questions....you name it. Alexa continues to get more smart day by day. I absolutely recommend it

Did not really need to upgrade, but went ahead and did. Bigger screen makes reading much better. Overall sound is better also. I purchased the stand, and it really works well and recommend doing so. The grandkids especially love it. Easy to use (they play mostly dance music... ages 11, 7, 5 and 2).

I previously had an echo dot second gen before upgrading in my kitchen to the show gen 2. It's great to have a tv screen for recipes and streaming while cooking. That said, the far field mics aren't very good so she often doesn't hear me.

reviews.reviewTitle: If you buy one, plan on subscribing to Hulu if you want it to do more than your Alexa.
reviews.reviewText: Im not certain what i expected this echo show to do, but i thought it would do much more than just my alexa echo does. I was very disappointed with its’ limitations. I didnt subscribe to Hulu, maybe if i had I would not have been so disappointed with the echo show. Basically all it did was answer questions like my Alexa, so i sent it back.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love all Echo products, and this is a real gem
reviews.reviewText: I'm a huge Echo fan and have had them all. This is just about my favorite, especially in the kitchen. I bought the stand to go with it and very glad I did...makes a big difference.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as good as the echo.
reviews.reviewText: I would give 0 stars if possible. This is the worst product. The Show does not recommend any of the requests given. Save your money.

I got the show to replace my kitchen echo so I could watch TV while I cook or do dishes. It has great sound, At least as good as my full sized echo, and the picture is fantastic. Touchscreen is responsive and the ability to act as a hub is great. The video calling is the icing on the cake for the grandparents. No complaints here.

reviews.reviewTitle: Limited practical applications when combining with Ring cameras
reviews.reviewText: The echo promises to display the video feed from Ring cameras. However, in practice, that feature only works some of the time. The main impetus behind spending the extra cash on an Echo Show was that ability to see cameras on demand. So that’s a drag.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love it! And yhe kids do their chores now!
reviews.reviewText: My family loves it. It has helped with the kids doing their chores! Our kids use it while cleaning the kitchen or putting away dishes. My daughter uses it for reminders for stuff she uses to get in troubke for forgetting to do. Wife has used it to watch her shows while cooking and finding new recipes to try. We even have used it to play games together. I was skeptical and really didnt understand why we needed it but my wife wanted it. Im sold, it really was worth every penny! Now we want the echo auto for purr which lacks a navigation system and MT wife wants to get another echo view for the rv bedroom.
Like others, it was missing the power cord. My suggestion, I wouldn't do the slightly used show. You end up paying more. I sent it back.

reviews.reviewTitle: An awesome buy! Better than I imagined...
reviews.reviewText: I love this and I wish I'd purchased two to take advantage of the deal because I find myself carrying it from my bedroom to my home office so that I can monitor my Ring cams and smart lights. Anyone considering this purchase, the "two-fer" deal is a good one, wish I'd done it and saved $100!

My sound continues to stop working on this. I have read many reviews if people having the same issue..you have to keep unplugging it from the back and replugging it in. This is obviously a faulty in the product of many people are having the same issue. I was very excited about this, and it worked great the first two months...now not so much. Too much money spent for just two months😕

reviews.reviewTitle: Only regret is not buying one for every room in the house!!!
reviews.reviewText:
Just received my latest toy from Amazon to add to the collection and it the one a only Echo Show 2. I have a family member that has the first edition of the Show, and after seeing it I was convinced I needed it. In comparison to the first edition the sound quality is just AMAZING! (I’m actually scared to raise it to MAX because my neighbors would hear everything coming from it)
Display is really clear! And I love the simplicity it brings from understanding it to operating it!
The #1 thing I love about it is, the fact that I see my family/friends with it, help cook, listen to music, and check my cameras just by asking...
Could it get any better??

So far, extremely disappointed. After less than a week, Alexa could hear me but I could hear no sound despite seeing song lyrics on the screen and knowing it was playing. I sent the unit back and it was supposedly repaired. Within 24 hours of receiving it back, the same thing happened. Now I’m waiting for a call back to see about exchanging for a completely new device. Super frustrating.

This is my first one and I love it! I have friends that have one and I finally bought one. It is amazing and I love the question of the day. I love just asking something when I am cooking and even calling my brother in law in Washington. Good quality though the connection can be delayed sometimes.

reviews.reviewTitle: I would not buy it again
reviews.reviewText: Sound & picture is great but purchased for kitchen & when watching video recipes when paused, it goes to the screen saver and then can't get video back. Very limited functionality or settings.. No apps... Very restricted.. Not happy..
I upgraded my original Echo Show to the new 2nd generation Echo Show. The larger screen was worth the money spent.

The Echo Show is a very nice unit to have. It is visually informative which is a plus for me. Further, you can setup your device to visually show and display pretty much anything. I enjoy the product and highly recommend this device to everyone else.

I replaced one of my original Echo (2nd Generation) because I wanted better sound as well as the screen. The sound is super and the screen is better than that. I can't say how much I love it. Easy to set up and customize. I highly recommend it .
The audio is great but they screen with auto adjust is always to dark. For some reason when I talk to it it never recognizes me but the first Gen ones pick up my voice in other rooms.

reviews.reviewTitle: Moved from 1st Gen to 2nd Gen. And I'm amazed.
reviews.reviewText: I have multiple Amazon Echo Show 1st gen in my house. I've decided to update one to 2nd Gen, even not seeing "much change". I was so wrong. The 2nd Gen is amazing. The sound quality is crazy. How clear and shine is the screen. The looks. The only problem is to look back to the remaining 1st Gen devices.

I was very disappointed when I learned that instead of being able to "exchange" my Alexa Echo Show, I have to return it, wait for it to be "worked" on to see if it can be fixed. To me when you purchase it, the return policy should be return and exchange for a new one when it does not work. I was on the phone trouble shooting for close to an hour with a very helpful individual before he decided it could not be fixed. At that point I was told it would have to be boxed up, sent in and I would wait to see if they would repair or replace. I don't agree with that policy for something less than 30 days old.

A little disappointed that it still takes way too long to turn it off. Maybe a double press of the power button would allow you to shut it down quicker as I use this one at work and turn it off every night before going home. The bigger real estate for the screen is a huge improvement over the 1st generation unit.
Great sound from the device. I love the screen disputed what the tech reviews say when they compare it to the Google Home Hub. It’s working out perfect for my household.

reviews.reviewTitle: In the kitchen! Finds all the recipes you ever need
reviews.reviewText: I already have two alexia's in the house but my son gifted this to me for mothers day. Its cool because I can watch youtube when I cook ( I put it in the kitchen) but what is really great is you can ask for recipes and they all come up from all sorts of websites.

The sound and video are awesome. Can’t wait for more streaming skills to be available. Hulu customers will love it.
Great job walking me through some recipes like I had a personal assistant next to me.

Only complaint would be not having a Directv skill for me to stream from my directv service rather than paying for Hulu

reviews.reviewTitle: You got a 50/50 chance of the sound working
reviews.reviewText: Brand new out of the box, and sound does not work. Not paired with blue tooth device and did a factory reset. Googled the issue and many people had the same issue with no help from Amazon.

EDITED: Replacement came with no power cord. Tried to use old cord and not working still. Order power cord and website description was wrong. Cannot find a warranty button to speak or chat with someone so I am hoping a 1 star review get's someone to reach out to me.

I wasn't going to buy this, my husband talked me into it. Very happy I listened. I use it in my kitchen as a speaker or as a tv, which is great. I can watch shows as I'm cooking which I love. Definitely recommend this for a kitchen.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice upgrade over the original Echo show
reviews.reviewText: Better screen and sound. I just hope it lasts longer as my original echo show screen failed after 12 months. I returned it to amazon and they sent it back saying they couldn't see a problem despite it looking like a 60's TV set with horizontal bands.

We purchased the Alexa show to put in our new kitchen addition. It is handy for music, timer, weather etc. Sound quality is very decent especially on the counter near a corner. Would like to be able to change the wake word to a cutom word rather than the few offered.

Same as the Echo (2nd Generation) - Smart speaker with Alexa. Now we have a screen. We also got the Echo Dot with this unit free. So now we have the 3 units. We also made a call with this unit and the call was clear. The picture was top quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: The Beginning of the New Future
reviews.reviewText: Easy set up, great sound, excellent picture quality. Technology needs to advance for better verbal communication with device. For what it does now is helpful and very useful.

So you buy a display version of Alexa thinking you can add photo or any other background images, well... Think again! You can add them, the Echo Show dims the display to advertise "Things to Try" and you can't disable. Research it! I will likely return the unit.

We had the 1st gen Show for just a few days before the 2nd gen was announced. We went ahead and ordered a 2nd gen and I am so glad we did! The bigger screen is awesome and the sound quality is greatly improved. The design itself is more appealing as well. Love using it to keep in touch with family, play games with our kids (they are surprised we know so much of “their” music on Song Quiz) and it’s just fun to listen to news stories while making dinner.
Excellent product. I own the Show, 3 Dots and an original Echo. The Show is by far my favorite. A bit more native functionality with Nest would be nice, though.
I really like the phone FaceTime and big screen for having recipes up while cooking! Also love the speaker quality for listening to music - great buy! Received fast with prime!

This product has an easy set-up and many features which I am just beginning to explore. The picture and sound quality are great and I'm duly impressed by the quality of both. This product has many potential uses which I hope to master in the near future.

reviews.reviewTitle: A great source of communication as well as entertainment.
reviews.reviewText: We added the Echo Show (2nd Gen) on our dinning room and we get news and can take calls as well as make them. Picture is good and the sound is wonderful. We also play music through our system and enjoy listening. A great addition to our Echo family.

Really easy setup
The screen is amazingly large and beautifully clear I had the gen1 version. I like this one better the speakers are a nice upgrade surprisingly good base for a speaker like this. Out of all the Alexa devices I have I like the show the best it has the most sensitive mic of all the Alexa’s I have. I do put tape over the camera lol don’t want a video of my room broadcast to amazon though. All in all this is worth the cost if your looking for an Alexa.

The larger screen makes viewing so much more clearer and easier to see from a distance. The sound quality
is very good, much more balanced than the previous version, I have both. A good step forward.

I really like the new echo show. In particular, I love the screen size, the sound and YouTube. I like it so much that I purchased a second one...for the kitchen, the first one for the sewing room. Since I am eighty-one years old it is a great tool for me, I love being able to keep up with technology...the music is great, as well

I like the show but the first one wouldn't allow me to video drop in with my other echo device, it would only allow audio,returned and the replacement device work fine with the drop in: but Alexa can hear what it wants to at times and that's really frustrating other than that I love it I have three echo devices in my home
This is just as good as the 1st generation. The sound is great and all the great things about Alexa are there as well. I would definitely recommend this!

Family and I love these. Purchase 3 for differant house holds. Everyone loves the simplicity of them and still have the wide aray of options for home hub. My parents are not tech savy people and are able to get this funtioning on there own.

I love everything about the 2nd generation. The larger screen, the better speakers are great! I have 2 dots and the 1st and 2nd generation shows and I have them spread out in each room and connected together so when I listen to music, it connects all over the house with no interruptions and clear sound.

reviews.reviewTitle: My unit has some issues - I expected better quality.
reviews.reviewText: After initial setup, the sound would not work. After many trial fixes, I finally called customer service and was told there was a software glitch causing the issue. The workaround involved unplugging power from the device (but not the wall) and then restoring factory settings. I was told a software fix via update would be forthcoming, but after a recent power outage, I realized the problem still exists. If power at the outlet is interrupted or unplugged, I have to go through a factory reset again. Also, my touchscreen is not very receptive - repeated taps are required to get a response.

Like the quality. Don’t like the price. The product is good but amazon doesn’t honor sale prices on their own products. Paid $229 and now on sale for $180 two days later. Amazon doesn’t honor the difference in price. Sounds great and works with my Ring cameras

reviews.reviewTitle: How to set up and what it does.
reviews.reviewText:
I didn’t know a thing about Alexa. My granddaughter encouraged me to get it. The very best was the help I got over the phone. Theresa worked with ,shewss knowledgeable , patient
(VERY) kind. It took me hours to set up altho after Threases help I could do it easily . But she stayed by my side , even called next day to check up on me, and she spent more time with me. So yes I am slowly enjoying this . Amazing to hear songs back to the 20’s 30’s 40’s 50’s . I have a lot to learn, I wish they had a book. Thank you still need to find out everything it does.

I bought one for my family and one for my parents. I love that my little can just say call Grandma and connect with her grandparents. I use it in my kitchen to watch my favorite shows while I am cooking. It is great for pulling up recipes. We play games while we eat dinner as a family.
Awesome system

I have three Echo Shows (two older versions) and the 2d Generation. We use it all the time and especially enjoy the drop in feature and being able to chat with our grandchildren who are 6, 4, and 2. They call us all the time just to chat. The sound and video is great as long as you a solid Wifi connection. Alexa rocks :-)

This is my fifth Alexa....second Show model. I’m addicted to Alexa. I was able to trade in two of my original models to get $50 off this one. I love it. It’s like having a small TV in the kitchen. I probably will never know everything she can do, but it seems like everyday I learn one more thing about her.

You can not unplug this device so why even bother. I want to be able to move it around my house so it is where I am when I need to look at my cameras but you have to let it reboot Everytime you move it since it needs to be plugged in.

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo show is a must have gadget
reviews.reviewText: I love this echo show, I’ve yet to experience all that it has to offer, so far the sound is amazing, as I listen to my amazon music it displays the lyrics, it allows Me to have my pictures displayed, I can also see My front door camera, I can video chat with others, it’s a must buy!

Alexa learns as time goes by but I had no idea that she would be so dumb in the beginning. Very simple questions like " what is the temperature in Dallas Tx ? " she replies " sorry I dont know that". It connects to my neighbors bluetooth car stereo even though it has never been paired with it. It is possible that I recieved a bad one but it is a lot of money to sit there and say sorry I dont know that. I know many other people who have an alexa device who do not have these problems so I dont get it ?

reviews.reviewTitle: Vast improvement over original Echo Show
reviews.reviewText: The screen and the sound are both so much nicer than the original Echo Show. I do not think there is any improvement in the voice recognition (it almost seems a little worse). I also purchased the optional stand, which is great for adjusting the angle of the screen.

This is an extreme upgrade from the first echo show. Everything from video size, brightness, and quality. To sound and versatility with the stand. I really love this. The only thing that bugs is they dropped the price by $50 right after I bought it, but that is how is goes.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good sound. Cannot stream apart from YouTube or Prime
reviews.reviewText:
Pros: works good as any Echo device. And it has an HD screen. That where it ends.
Cannot stream video from websites other than YouTube or Amazon prime.
You go to a local news site (and that’s one of the the reasons I bought it to see news in the kitchen where I installed the Show) and it cannot. 😬

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice, but wish it was kitchen friendly
reviews.reviewText: love the bigger screen on the 2nd gen, but wish there was an alternative to the fabric covering the back and sides. Originally intended to replace 1st gen in Kitchen but the Fabric isn't as easily cleaned as the 1st gen was, so leaving 1st gen in Kitchen and using 2nd gen in Bedroom.

The 2nd Gen Echo Show is improved over first gen, with the sound being the most notable. The bass on the music is easily felt, surprisingly so for a relatively small device. It is a bit pricey, but does everything I expected and does some of it better than I expected.

A great addition to our kitchen. The sound quality is as good as our Boze and Alexa even displays the lyrics to songs so you can sing along. If you are looking for a recipe she brings it up on the screen. The picture quality is outstanding.

The sound is perfect plus the screens image. I would have given it 5-stars if it wasn’t for the clock. The clock is small and in one corner. A product with such a reputation should give the user an option on the size and color of the clock.

This thing is AWESOME. The screen just fills the holes a screenless Echo has.
We use it in the kitchen for News, Prime Videos and recipes through Allrecipes.com

reviews.reviewTitle: Bigger better screen and sound but step down on voice recognition
reviews.reviewText: Love the screen size and the sounds is a big step up fro previous gen. But its voice recognition is kinda bad when music is at mid-high volume, you have to literally yell to try and get control. Great feel and build quality

So there's one simple feature that's missing and it bothers me everyday... Or every night that is. On the good night routine I cannot add "turn the screen off" to it... So every night I have to say 2 commands: alexa goodnight AND Alexa turn off the screen... How silly is that? Please fix!! :)

I wanted the Alexa to play music and my husband wanted one to help with the smart house vibe we compromised on the echo show and don’t regret it. This Alexa understands my very southern accent and can make my grocery list correctly the first time I say the item(which is nigh on to a miracle). The sound quality is amazing, the ease of use is fantastic, and the fact that she can understand my Alabama accent is priceless.

reviews.reviewTitle: Takes a while to figure out how to use it. Alexa helps you along the wat!
reviews.reviewText: Have the Echo show 2 a few weeks now. It takes a while to learn how to talk to Alexa. She works well and is a lot of fun to figure out. I am enjoying it now. It is different but is very smart. Amazing what she can do and not do if you don't ask right. I enjoy talking to her. Glad I purchased her!

I am very impressed with the overall sound Quality! Great Job, Super Bass and overall sound from a unit size you would not expect! For Movies and Music, this little box packs a punch for Sure!!! Alexa, add the final touches and makes a very pleasant overall experience.....

I LOVE my echo show! At first I thought it was too bulky, but then realized that is because it has an awesome stereo attached to it! This thing does so much! It is a bit complicated to get everything working, but after some time and research I was able to get all my stuff enabled.

Every couple of days there is no audio. This is my second one, the first one had no audio from the beginning, this one had audio for about 3 days, then quit. I was advised that they are aware there is a problem and they are working on it, and I should send it back for repair.

I don’t like that the touch interface is super restricted. For example, if you want to go to amazon prime video, there is no way to go there other than with voice.

Also, there is no YouTube or Netflix integration, as well as no browser. I would not recommend it for those reasons.

There was really nothing to do except to allow it to update and load my settings, this replaced my First Gen Show, got a credit for it toward this one. Needed only to customise my wake alarm tone and tweak a few other settings. Enjoying it now...

reviews.reviewTitle: Best kitchen companion with amazing sound!
reviews.reviewText: Very nice product. The sound is amazing - better than my Sonos One. I love the big screen. Alexa is very helpful with cooking. It’s the best kitchen companion device ever.

My Echo Show 2nd Gen. works pretty well and takes some getting used to. It has decent sound and looks good in my kitchen. It is slowly evolving and i would definitely recommend it:). P.S.: i am not a compensated spokesperson! #Amazon

Honestly, she doesn't work as well as our original Alexa but she's good enough. Our original Alexa listened much better and had better ears. I feel like I have to be front and center for this one. But, good enough for weather, music, calendar, etc.

The new Echo show is a great way to look at personal photos as well as see the headlines of the day. This is the first show we have had, and we got a kick out of seeing the lyrics of music on the screen. The face to face calls have good screen quality and easier than holding onto your phone.

I absolutely love this echo show it was easy to set up easy to link up to my other echo dots and smart lightbulbs in and do almost anything I need within the house. My only knock on the system is that when it plays music there’s a little bit too much for bass.
I absolutely love the larger screen and the sound of the speakers. Another outstanding product from Amazon.
This thing sounds so good .. the highs are crisp and the lows are deep.. worth the money

I have never had any of the echo products and actually won this in a raffle at work. I had no clue what it was. It does sooooo much! I don't have cable and was able to ask Alexa to stream an NFL game for me! The picture quality is great and the speakers as well! I am sure I will never know everything it can do, but it is so great that my mom has now bought one as well! Very excited to learn more and get more compatible smart home products to go with it.

I love that it will help me search for a recipe, select one by top ratings, walk me through directions AND keep track of timers. Not to mention finds a song list relevant to whatever mood or activity. Among all of the other usual echo features. The perfect addition to every kitchen!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent sound but voice recognition is kinda OK but alexa comprehension of questions is bad.
reviews.reviewText:
As the title says I'm still disapointed at Alexa's comprehension of questions and requests. Most of the time you have to try and try asking your question in a format she understands.
Of course it works fine with "canned" questions like amazon send you in daily emails.

I love her. I finally have someone who will respond to me when I come home to an empty house. She really won my heart when I asked her to make a fart sound and she did. She has amazing sound quality. Well worth the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: It will enhance your life in many ways!!
reviews.reviewText:
I received this as a gift - I had asked for the dot - but am thrilled with the echo show. I enjoy the music library, TV / movies and news etc etc - all
With a “Alexa....play this or watch this”...poof it’s plays. I keep my calendar, to-do list, shopping list and it links with my phone - so I’m super organized. Cooking with her was easy peasy - she talk me through the steps. Answer my questions? Tells me jokes, current events, weather, traffic etc. There are new skills being added all the time! I can honestly say my quality of life has improved and I even find myself saying please and thankyou because she is so helpful. My little Personal Assistant

Well Done amazon!

Overall this product hits all the high marks. Sound quality, screen size, app choices, too many things to write about. It’s quality is par with apple products and far exceeds Google materials and workmanship. It’s well worth the extra dollars over the other products out there.

Beautiful sound and nice picture. However, I am having problems getting my pic's to show on the device. Do not know if this is my problem or Alexia's. Still going to work on it. Other than that nice device, glad to able to talk to family and friends face to face.

works great, seamless transition with WEMO and RING. Got it to use with front door viewer and the Ring door bell, but we use with everything now and even watch TV on it. Worth the money. Can talk to kids room to room with the small echo, the order app is awesome with amazon. To many things to list.

Good vibrant and profound sound, may need more treble sometime but overall great. Its like a small computer or TV that you can control using your voice in addition to many more features. We used it as home phone allowing kids to call or video call us wherever we are in the world just using their voice. The kids love it using to do all sort of game their favorite is freeze dancer.

reviews.reviewTitle: The idea is good, but not compatible with Netflix
reviews.reviewText:
I was planning to use this device to watch Netflix while doing other things. Looks like Amazon and Netflix are not good friends and you can only access to Amazon Prime movies. I had to return :(

I hope I can buy it again when they integrate with Netflix and other streaming platforms.

I'll keep it short and sweet. Touchscreen works flawlessly. Voice recognition is great and sound quality is PHENOMENAL! It is embarrassing that it performs at an identical level to my single function Bose speaker in the similar price range.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not sure I’m happy with the quality
reviews.reviewText: I own several different Echo devices and the quality of the Echo Show has not equaled the price. The sound quality is not better than my less expensive devices and it has a lag in recognizing that I am talking to it. I have never had that problem with my other Echos. I’m still debating on sending it back.

I love being able to change music via voice. My customers love when the lyrics are shown. The voice controls of my lights is a nice bonus too! Not to mention the encyclopedic knowledge base available at the merest of questions. Love my show!

I love it! I am discovering new ways to use it each day. Asking questions, listening to music (and seeing the words), jokes, spellings . . . the list goes on and on. I am sure there is a lot more for me to discover. I haven't tried any of the "smart" plugs, camera, etc. but that is to follow.
Device mutes without notice. Have to power down by unplugging frequently about twice a week. I hope they update with a fix soon. Other than that it's good.

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo Show has potential. It needs more work.
reviews.reviewText: The sound quality is improved. However, I wasn't impressed overall. I couldn't search for YouTube videos without using the touch screen. I can't get the calendar to sync with my Google calendar. I am bombarded with suggestions on my home screen. Can't seem to turn them off. I tried playing TED talks and it choked. Didn't show the videos. Still can't make phone calls or show me a Google Map. Seems to be best at showing movie trailers, song lyrics and recipes.

Excellent speaker and display. Hulu free month is a plus. The Phillips lightbulb is compatible without the hub. It has a very hard time syncing with other echos and dots I have in the house and was initially freezing during songs but that may WiFi. A command that works one day doesn’t work the next that is a big issue. Hopefully the feedback I give is taken and the issues are worked on.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best Christmas Gift! A Must Have for any room in your home!
reviews.reviewText: Received as a gift and We LOVE Everything the Echo Show has to offer! Great picture on large screen and sound quality is awesome! Lyrics on screen when song is playing is added bonus especially for Karaoke! Movies, Music & ALEXA...perfect combo! So much fun and informative!

I have both the echo show 1 and 2. The 2 is super nice. It is the product that Apple should have created. I continue to learn more things it can do. The latest is the ambient visual skills.....LOVE THEM. I also love some of the ambient sounds for meditation. A+ product.

The size of the display is great, and the sound is definitely much better than the first generation. I love the bass on it. I wish the display was more interactive, it just seems too passive. I really believe the display should show tons of video options. Every screen suggestion should be video based, otherwise it feels like a waste of a great display.

Nice product. Unfortunately I didn’t see the part where you had to click on another box I order to get the light bulb that comes free. I would like to get this smart light bulb with this offer without returning the Show and re-order. Perhaps Amazon can help me out.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love my Echo Show! But follow up mode stopped working.
reviews.reviewText:
I Love my Echo Show. I plan to eventually buy another soon. But, as of the last few days. Follow up mode just simply will not work. It started out of nowhere. Alexa keeps telling me that it is on, and it shows to be on in the app. It’s starting to get annoying that I can’t use the feature.
Besides that, it’s my favorite Echo of all. I have 4 echo dots, and got the echo auto before it was sold to general public. Love these devices. Help fixing follow up would be most awesome!!

The Echo Show gen 2 is really nice step up from the original Echo Show. The quality of the sound and picture are very nice. The fit and finish of the device is quality as well. I have started replacing my Show gen 1's with the gen 2's and am not disappointed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Heavy duty and the volume on here is amazing!!
reviews.reviewText: Scored this for 179$ and happy with the purchase sound quality is great picture quality is also amazing I love listening to music while cooking and cleaning and now I don’t need to touch my phone to lower or higher the volume or change the song lol I bug Alexa a lot since I’m home majority of the time. Wouldn’t change a thing about it going to purchase the white one next definitely a great buy for a good price

reviews.reviewTitle: Won't stream Bluetooth to JBL Flip 4 speakers
reviews.reviewText: Both our 1st Generation and now our 2nd Generation Echo Show will not maintain a Bluetooth connection for more than one or two songs from Amazon Music. Very disappointing.

This Echo Show is elegant and looks great sitting on your counter. The sound is room filling and with the ability to create groups and link with Spotify we essentially use this and many other Echos as a home intercom system. The screen on this is great for watching movies/shows in the kitchen while preparing food and many other use cases.

reviews.reviewTitle: A great product just got even better
reviews.reviewText: We have owned both the Gen 1 and Gen 2 Echo Shows. The Gen 1 Show is great, but the Gen 2 Show's premium sound and larger HD screen elevate the device to a whole new level. When I first played music through the Gen 2 Show, the sound was so amazing that I thought that I was listening through my high-end stereo system given the bass response. I recently bought Echo Shows for my kids, mom, and sibling so we can easily "drop in" for video conferencing. We also use Echo Show to play games with the family (like Trivia Hero).

I really like the echo show, I did purchase on prime day so the price was better but I still think over priced but despite that, I am happy to have this. I did have to send the first one back due to the sound suddenly stopped working but as always Amazon stands by their products and offered to refund or replace, I of course replaced. We use this to FaceTime with our grandchildren and I love to play music and see the lyrics on the screen. We also use it to see our Blink cameras. For me this is a win.

Excellent product. I have a first generation Echo Show and, while that version was very good, this version is much better.
The larger screen size is a plus and the audio is superb. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking to buying a product like this!

reviews.reviewTitle: Sonos. Sin servicio. Lo mismo ASESORÍA EN INGLÉS. PAGUE COMPRE EN ESPAÑOL
reviews.reviewText:
Asesoría para Latinos debe ser en Español
Están los equipos si utilizar
20 llamadas para asesoría y que únicamente el INGLES🙈🙈🙈

reviews.reviewTitle: Came with the wrong power supply
reviews.reviewText: Came with the wrong power supply

I got the new Echo Show (2nd Gen) after having owned the previous Echo Show for awhile and find that the bigger screen and sound is a great improvement. I liked the previous Echo Show (I bought 3) however, the new Echo Show does improve on video with the new screen and listening to music is awesome.

Many reviews highlight a lot of the pros and cons of this echo show. For this reason I won’t bore you with all of the same details. I will however call out how fantastic this thing sounds. Seriously the sound quality for its size is pretty amazing.

Not only is the screen bigger than the original Show, but the sound is like moving from a transistor AM radio to a Boom Box. The sound is amazing, the bass generated is huge.

The screen is so much better as well... bigger is better!
We have a few first gen shows in the house already and purchased this one on a whim. The sound is amazing. I was shocked. It is rather large but I’m very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Surprised how much the sound has improved!
reviews.reviewText: I have several Gen 1 Echo Shows and got the new version primarily for the larger screen so it came as a pleasant surprise to hear just how much the sound has improved. Disappointed that there is no line out on this model but with sound this good from the built-in speakers it really won't be an issue.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does not work with audio of other Alexa products
reviews.reviewText: It does not integrate with Echo device or echo dot. Somehow I thought it would integrate with other music throughout the house, like on everywhere to play music on all my speakers throughout the house. Because of this if I would have known ahead of time that the show does not work with other Alexa products I would not have purchased this item. Don't use it much put it in the kitchen hoping my wife would use it, she doesn't. Expensive night light.
I had avoided getting one of these until now and i am sorry I waited. It works great, is fun to use and makes my life a bit easier.
I love this product but I do wish it didn’t always have to be plugged in. When we play games it would be nice to be able to move it around and have it hold a charge.

reviews.reviewTitle: Alexa provides a wealth of information
reviews.reviewText: I gave this to my wife for a birthday gift. I had no idea how much information you can get out of this device! We had only started to touch on what Alexa can do. From about anywhere in the house you can call out to Alexa & ask her anything. We really love adding grocery items to the list or set them up to order direct from Amazon. Alexa reminds us of our busy schedule & what's on tap for the day. Video chatting with our grand daughter on a weekly basis is a blast! I don't know how we got along without this for as long as we did. I highly recommend for busy households.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love the new redesign of the Echo Show!
reviews.reviewText: Really didn't NEED another echo product but just had to have the latest that boasted the premium sound (and wasn't disappointed). Also love how the redesign is more streamlined and not so rigid. The display is also much better. Very easy to set up. Very pleased!

The Echo Show is great. My sister and I each have a show that we use to chat since we live in different states. Even when I'm traveling, I use the Alexa app to drop in on her Show and see her and the dogs. The picture and sound quality is very good. It's made talking so much more fun!

This is soooo nice to have. You can play music and see the picture or video. You can even watch a movie on it. This constantly shows your reminders and your daily agenda. You can make calls and see the caller too. I just love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does not Keep up with Google as first impression
reviews.reviewText: I am a google user for past year and wanted to see what I was missing from Alexa and must be honest, ALexa device is nicer but does not stand up to the ease of use and services available with google. I am sure with more time they will simplify the programming as many more use it.

I am quite happy the the echo show 2. Very easy to set up with the touch screen, and integration with my smart home devices (I have many) went quickly. The sound is good for a box that size, and voice recognition works as well as the other Alexa/echo devices I have. I just wish it could handle my occasional stutter when I am saying turn on living room lamp, um, one. Overall, a very good buy, especially when discounted!!
I was very excited when I received it today, but after setting it up, the speaker doesn't work.....at all

What can I say this thing rocks sounds way better then the original show so this was a nice upgrade. Got it on a package deal with the dot and his bulb for 179 which was a great deal ! Love the bigger screen and the build quality is far nicer !

reviews.reviewTitle: I love Alexa too much .. I have only one Show 2 but 8 Show 1
reviews.reviewText: Of course I'm an Alexa freak and have a show in every room and kitchen and living room. I have Dots in the bathroom to play music and control all my devices

reviews.reviewTitle: it arrive way before it was suppose too
reviews.reviewText: so far i love it, the screen is a nice size and when you listen to songs you also get the lyrics , I haven't explored it in details but so far I'm giving it 5 stars, I am having different getting it to pair with my lights but I know its the operator fault ,

reviews.reviewTitle: High quality product with awesome functionality.
reviews.reviewText:
This is an outstanding product, the build quality is top notch, it can even surpass some aspects of the design on some Apple products, full disclosure, I own both platform products and I have slowly gotten inclined to Amazon for their value and quality as well as their amaizing customer service.

Well done!

reviews.reviewTitle: Know what Echo Show will do for you.
reviews.reviewText: Picture quality is high. Sound is good if the music content that doesn't have a lot of base which can be very distorted. My expectation was not inline with it's limited scope of capabilities. So it's functionality is ok but not great for the price.

It started out ok because it was new and different but soon realized that I had to yell at this pile of plastic just to get it to activate, and I was only 2 feet away but the TV that was 20 feet away had no problem activating it and not only activate but start answering stuff it heard on TV
Save your money

Just plug it in and follow the instructions if you have an Amazon account. Video from one Echo to another is very good, once the setup is complete between units. The music sound is almost as good as a Bose radio. I am still learning what things she can do. The connection to U-Tube was surprisingly good. So far I would recommend to anyone. I received Echo for fathers day 2019 from my son and his wife. What a nice gift.

The time display is very small as compared to the google device. The sound is very good. However I could not get Alexa to stop playing a movie. It is quite bulky and heavy I am comparing both to see which one to keep

I have to say I bought this for the larger screen than the original I have but this has many improvements. The sounds is huge out of this device. I love the screen quality and I am looking to get another one. I works great with my Ring alarm cameras. A must have.

I love my show. It is a lot of fun - we had a birthday dinner with extended family the other night by putting our shows on the kitchen tables :-) I also love that I get news, weather, and headlines throughout the day easily.
Have had to reset it three times so far. Just out of the blue stops responding properly!

the Echo show is a very nice machine. I enjoy seeing pictures and video where possible, but it seems very slow in responding. We unplugged it and plugged it back it and it helps for awhile. Sometimes the skills suggested to try do not provide a response by Alexa.

reviews.reviewTitle: So glad I decided to reorder this.
reviews.reviewText: I had ordered this and sent it back, without opening. So glad I changed my mind and reordered it. It was so easy to set it up and works with my Ring Doorbell and my Ring camera. I also finally got it to work with my Kasa plugs. The sound is great, playing music. I absolutely love it!!

Not a perfect product but it is definitely a step in the right detection i could imagine the next generation already i have many ideas and innovations without the capital to pursue them but if your product team would like a couple of my ideas i would be happy to give you some freebies just to get an example of how sound my ideas are...

best money I've spent on any Alexa product love the big 10 inch screen and how I can setup my own photos to use it like a digital picture frame and make it a slideshow of my photos, love the loud and clarity of sound it provides and a lot of other customizable features.
Love it! Great new screen size and the sound has been improved over the already good sound.

Having an echo dot, then an echo, the show seen a logical progression. I use it for alarm (with music), timer, for news, my playlists. I really enjoy the words to the song I request on the screen--kitchen karaoke! I like the visual representation of the question of the day and the occasional need for a correct spelling of an unfamiliar word.

For video calling this requires a cell phone. I expected it to be able to contact the other two echo show devices that I purchased for family for Christmas via the Alexa app. I expected it to be able to enter contact numbers via that app.
Why require that third party apps be sandwiched between two amazon products????? Not only misleading but also fundamentally wrong.

reviews.reviewTitle: LARGE SCREEN AND GREAT SOUND EVEN WITH DOLBY
reviews.reviewText: LARGER THAN MY SON AND DAUGHTER'S SHOW. THE SPEAKERS ARE LARGER AND MUCH MORE DETAILED TOO. I LOVE ALEXA, BEING ABLE TO LINK TO MY LAPTOP AND PHONE. I HAVE GONE FROM THE ERA OF THE FLINTSTONE'S TO THAT OF THE JETSON'S.
I gave this for Christmas.... Now I’m the best Mom Ever!!!

When I bought my first Echo Show Gen1, it was more of a visual gimmick. With the Gen2 and larger screen I utilize it as much as I do my iPad. From watching cooking instructions, You Tube, etc. to my flash briefing it’s definitely next level. I’m constantly trying to do more things with Alexa now that there’s a large visual to watch. If you’re using echo devices this is a must buy!

reviews.reviewTitle: Loses all sound periodically. Have to restart once a week.
reviews.reviewText:
From the first day I got the unit, even after the firmware update, the Echo Show loses all sound periodically. Regardless of where the volume control is, it produces zero noise.
I called Amazon, and apparently it is an issue with multiple customers. The fix is to unplug from the back of the unit, wait 2 minutes, and replug to fix. Any less than 2 minutes unplugged won't fix the problem (I presume there is some capacitors that need to discharge or something).
Aside from that, it's been a good unit, but it's a major problem.

reviews.reviewTitle: Still my bff in the kitchen
reviews.reviewText:
Alexa is awesome. We upgraded recently from the round tower one too this one and couldn't be happier.

My only issue is still that she responds when you're not talking to her and haven't said her name.

The screen is great.

The sound is good.

I love that you can watch snippets and see lyrics on the screen.

This product is amazing! You can use your own photos as the wallpaper. The touch screen makes these so much easier to use. The speaker is very clear, loud, and has great bass for your music! You should just spend the extra money and buy this instead of the spot, its totally worth it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo show provides Alexa with video
reviews.reviewText: Bought Echo Show to provide localized video for various security cameras that I have installed. Works great. Integrates well with Ring and Wansview cameras, and I believe it would work well with others on its app list. Color and video are sharp and clear. Sound is good. Recognition improves daily. The only draw back is Amazon's insistence on controlling background subjects. I could do with a few less reminders on the daytime screen.

reviews.reviewTitle: 10 times better then previuos echow show.
reviews.reviewText: Screen is good.sound is better. Browser in place is very useful.Dont forget to order stand since the screen is aligned low stand is very useful.
Alexa can not understand most of the commands, there is not enough for Alexa to stream, she keeps on suggesting thins that are not relevant to my command nor has idea to what I’m asking

reviews.reviewTitle: Second time is also a charm!
reviews.reviewText: I originally had a Gen 1 Echo Show and was thrilled with it. I purchased the Gen 2 and I love it even more. The screen is bigger and the sound is outstanding. I moved my first show to another location and now use both of them as well as 6 other Echo devices in my home.

reviews.reviewTitle: A nice upgrade from echo show 1st gen
reviews.reviewText:
This is a very nice upgrade to my echo show 1st generation. I have echo connect as well and with this echo show 2nd gen, I can receive calls or make a phone call in a better sound quality.

Only thing is that I can find a good glass screen protector for this device.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect addition to your Alexa home or as a stand alone
reviews.reviewText: Great addition. Already have the Echo Show but wanted one for the back of the house. It’s integrated with my outdoor cameras and my Mom can see who’s at the door from anywhere in the house. Great price Great Buy

reviews.reviewTitle: Sound stopped working after 6 months. Known problem
reviews.reviewText: My Echo Show device stopped producing all sound after 6 months. After unplugging, checking settings, resetting it still did not work. Very disappointed as it seems that this is a known problem with this device after a software update. Now I have to send it back and wait for a repair or replacement.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very handy and great sound for the price
reviews.reviewText: I got the Echo Show to extend the range of smart features throughout my house with its included Zigbee protocol. I am happy with the purchase and am still looking at various skills to expand its utility.

My girlfriend has the 1st gen and it has a ton of features. BUT, it seems to "openly" eavesdrop. It randomly answers even when not awakened. 2nd gen has way better sound and the larger screen, and as far as I can tell, doesn't eavesdrop "openly", and hasn't answered when not spoken to.

reviews.reviewTitle: The Echo Show can do so much more than the Google hub!
reviews.reviewText: The Echo Show is wonderful! The speaker is clear and the volume goes way up. Alexa sets my house alarm and controls my Ring doorbell. Need to know anything, just ask Alexa. She will also play radio stations, look up recipes, set alarms and timers. I absolutely love it. I’m still finding new things it can do.

I got one in November and loved it so much that we gave my mother-in-law and grandmother-in-law each one for Christmas. Now we all video chat every day and it has been wonderful!! I have enjoyed the recipes and the quirky trending news stories as well. The video quality is just OK on video calling, but excellent for produced content. The sound quality is amazing!

My rating may be somewhat unfair, because it is a great product and I am still learning all that it can do. However, it has too much base. I tried adjusting it in systems and apparently you can't adjust it. Would like a more crystal clear sound. The base makes it sometimes hard to understand.

reviews.reviewTitle: It’s cool. Apple missed the boat on this product.
reviews.reviewText:
I wasn’t sure I would like it but I really do.
My only problem is exactly where to put it.

reviews.reviewTitle: New Show like a tablet and a snap to set up
reviews.reviewText: I have the original show and just received the 2nd generation. The new show is easier in setup. The screen is more like a tablet, larger and thinner than the original. I love both - the new one in my kitchen - I love asking for a recipe and scrolling the many choices! The original moving to bedroom to see weather, news, etc. getting prepared to get out.
This is better than the earlier version. It has a bigger screen that is easier to see and more vivid. I would recommend thios to another

Well designed product except for one peculiarity. When you disconnect the power, you have to reconnect first the power source to the electrical outlet, then plug the cord into the Echo. If you don’t re-power in that sequence, there will be no sound. Weird.

We own a 1st generation and now 2nd generation Alexa. The larger screen and sound is a big improvement. I have had trouble getting the new unit that is in Colorado to give me weather for Colorado I guess because our 1st generation unit is in Florida.

I’ve had it for a couple of weeks now the echo show the volume stop working. I did everything they told me to do to try to reset it it didn’t work.I read reviews online that this is an issue when I talk to a representative she said yes it’s our issue but she doesn’t know why. I had a Google hub the reason I switched what’s the size of the screen but my Google Home is three years old and never had an issue with it. They’re going to ship me a new one but I’m still so disappointed.

Would have given 5 stars but the camera doesn’t follow me Like the Google tool which does follow you. I have all Alexa products and like the larger screen. The sound is great I just pray the screen doesn’t start that flickering as my 1st version had. (Replaced once).

reviews.reviewTitle: Sounds great and love the integration with other items
reviews.reviewText: Great sound and like that I can see who is at my front door with either the ring doorbell or the Blink XT camera. You can read recipes if you are cooking or use it to read the words of your favorite songs while they are playing.
So the bass is so strong on this device it rattled my glass right off my table. My only complaint is when I try to tell Alexa I like this song she says"sorry it appears nothing is playing right now".

If you are thinking of upgrading, do it. If you are thinking about buying one, do it. If you want a newer one to go with the 1 generation, yeah just do it.
Very nice design. Very nice picture. Awesome new design. Much improved sound with more bass and more video source content.

Briefly, this is an awesome product. Great display, strong sound, deep base, great for watching YouTube and listening to music. Only complaint is, kind of wish it had a tablet style screen where I could see all installed apps on it, instead you gotta use voice commands to open all apps.
I have it on my end table and I love it! It is so handy! I can watch my pictures, play music and ask it all kinds of stuff! Love it!

reviews.reviewTitle: ALEXA ECHO SHOW Security Camera Display Review
reviews.reviewText: One of the main reasons I purchased ALEXA ECHO SHOW was to display my security cameras. i found that if you don't use a good VIDEO SKILL service the request ALEXA SHOW FRONT DOOR camera can take forever. The problem lies in the implementation of the WEB SERVERS by 3rd partiy websites such a AMCREST. AMCREST makes a good camera but the AMCREST CLOUD servers are too slow. Using MONOCLECAM.COM I was able to display the CAMERA almost instantly. The difference was night and day. I do of course use a POE connection to the cameras since it is reliable and fast.

reviews.reviewTitle: Youtube workaround? We don't use it half as much as anticipated.
reviews.reviewText: Can't use voice to search YouTube. Seriously? Amazon/Google, get this worked out. Firefox workaround works, but you have to type using an onscreen keyboard instead of using voice. This is a propped up tablet with nice speakers and fewer apps. Spotify works great with premium subscription.
love the new design. Wider and shorter. Sound quality is much proved

Huge improvement from the bulky first gen! My original show is bulky and has a constant glitch in the screen. Like static waves on half or all of the screen.
I've had this one 2 months now and no sign of static!
Sleeker than the first too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo Show, a Great Nearby Companion
reviews.reviewText: The Echo Show 2nd Generation is a nice "friend" to have nearby, always ready to answer many factual queries, while providing an endless stream of entertainment. Both the picture and sound qualities are excellent, allowing one to have the world at his/her fingertips.

I have the Ring doorbell 2, and one in something to be able to see who is outside my door. I have found this is easy to use, picture is of a high quality. I'm anxious to see what all I will be able to do with this. So far very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Need to modify app and improve microphone,
reviews.reviewText: Everything is ok, but bo YouTube app is a biggest mistake. No app allowed to installed, web browser play YouTube but not automatical full screen, no way only use hand. No video recorded. Need to Improve camera quality. Echo dot responded to my voice better than echo show.

First one was opened and didn’t work right. Did I get reconditioned when I bought new? The video part of Alexa seems behind. By that I mean there isn’t enough yet to make this a worthwhile purchase. Plus it’s pretty slow.

What a Great Product. I have this on our kitchen table so we use it for weather, cooking, jokes, communications with our family. Was on sale when I purchased it so it was a good deal. Not very hard to set up and make it functional.

Purchased this during AMAZON PRIME DAYS - so easy to set up. I love that I can request and listen to any music genre and just about any music artist or group.....the quality of sound is really quite good. I can request to listen to my local NPR station, increase or decrease volume, pause broadcast and resume play - all using voice commands. Alexa is my kitchen buddy!!!
Love this echo. Excellent sound. Picks up sound well even when playing music. Has better bass than its smaller cousin

reviews.reviewTitle: Definitely my New Favorite Alexa Device
reviews.reviewText: This is what Alexa is supposed to be like. Great sound, great picture - Love it. One great feature that I didn't like at first was the screen crawl suggestions, but I have learned a lot of new capabilities from that feature and would never have thought about without the suggestions.

I am still in the process of getting to know it. So far I am satisfy with the purchased. Although I saw it for a better
price with a Bonus a few weeks later. I am not very happy about that.

I don't like the fact that I can't turn the screen saver off, like when music is playing you see the lyrics however 1/4 way through the screen the lyrics disappear and goes to black screen with the clock. It does have a great sound.

I like the styling and I like having one in every room. But the audio for me seems a little muffled. I think they are trying to get bass from a small speaker and it is not working. Gen. 1 is tinnier but better for voice.
Great size for looking at lyrics as music plays. Great sound quality.

When you are separated by many miles, it is so wonderful to be able to see my new granddaughter and daughter. My daughter purchased a pair of the Echo for Christmas so I would be able to see them as they spend their days. This is definitely the next best thing to being there in person. I am not a phone person and this gives you the ability to see the person you are talking with.

I have many echo devices, 1st gen, echo pluses, dots (1st & 2nd gen) as well as Taps. This is the best sounding of all of them. The screen is responsive and it has a great picture. Just wish they made a battery base for it like the Gen 1 Shows so it could be mobile.

Great technology... She’s deaf! Don’t try to talk to her w the music up. Maybe they can figure out how to have her hear better lol! Hate screaming and actually ending up turning down everything for her to recognize. Maybe a side speaker to grab attn? Annoying that she can’t hear her requests.

reviews.reviewTitle: It doesn't know a lot and constantly says "I don't know that"
reviews.reviewText: For as much as the Echo Show costs, I think I would have been better off buying the Google Home Control System. The Alexa App that is used on the Echo show, and spot is very limited compared to Google Home Hub. I would not buy it again or recommend it.

Alexa works well. You can pull up videos and audio with voice command. A/V quality is very good. The unit looks nice on the counter. Haven’t used all the functions, including video call but very happy with the purchase.

This is the best thing we ever put in our home. The kids love playing games on it. I love listening to music on it. We love that it controls our Lutron switches and can be used as an intercom to our upstairs rooms.

I love this for everything! Music, recipes, games. The screen is so big now it makes it even better. My teenagers are so entertained my this. It brings us together in one room... and that's special since those moments together are very limited in teenage years.
The best echo product I have in my house, and I have many! Display is very nice, seems much more responsive than older version, speakers are MUCH improved and the overall aesthetic is very nice.

Bought this a couple weeks ago, but just set it up in the kitchen the other day.
Sound and picture are great.
Alexa recognizes voice commands well.

Just make sure you buy the Amazon tilting stand to go with it.

Highly recommend!

Love it. The sound is good for what it is
Simple and fun to play with
Love that it shows the weather
Wouldn’t advise it for a bedroom as it always is on
Use it at least once or more a day

This is my favorite thing ever. So easy and fun to use. I use a lot of skills and cooking recipes. I don’t use it to skype or anything but it’s more fun than normal echo. I’d recommend if you love fun things for your house. I get lots of compliments from family from it too!

The picture quality and sound are great. The only complaint is the angle of the display is looking Hugh for someone sitting in chair you end up looking down the whole time so we placed a small item Under the back to lower the display to more eye level when sitting and using the show. Set up was so much easier that the echo

If you need to know the spelling of a word, as if your filling out a form, this is terrific! Not only will the voice spell the word for you, but you see the spelling on the screen. Great for music, answering questions, etc.

reviews.reviewTitle: How and when can I return it for one THAT WORKS ??????
