reviews.reviewText: I bought my echo show but NOW I GET NO SOUND !! IT ALL WORKED FINE FOR ABOUT AN HOUR ! BUT THEN THE SOUND STOPPED WORKING ! I tried resetting it, twice, but it still has no sound ! I need to return it but I have no return information !

I love this product! The quality of video is great, easy access to everything I look for. I have used it mostly for Hulu and listening to music at this point but am excited to try recipes and other things on it in the future. The sound is great. Very easy to set up. Would definitely recommend.
We enjoyed our Echo dot but really enjoy the integration of Ring with the Show so we can see who's at the front door. Like the screen size and easy adaptability to our wifi network. #smarthome

We had the first generation then wanted the bigger screen which we like though it is a little fuzzy on video calls. It also doesn’t make a noise when you say Alexa to let you know she heard but overall it’s good

The first Echo Show lost the sound after a couple days. The replacement unit has been working well so far. The speakers delivery exceptional sound for the size of the device, and the screen is sharp and clear.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great way to stay in touch with someone that can’t facetime via phone
reviews.reviewText: Perfect system for my needs. I wanted a way to drop in on my elderly parent with dementia and it has worked without a glitch. She gets a friendly chime when I am about to appear on the screen and she doesn’t have to do anything to accept the call (there are several privacy setting options and this was my choice). Set up was a breeze. Instead of creating a separate account for my parent’s house, I set it up as another device in my group even though I am in another state. The only complaint would be that the screen image cannot be enlarged.

I am really enjoying my echo show. I have had an echo and three dots, but this echo show is so versatile. Can bring up recipes, shows temperature, weather. Speakers are great for music. Also can regulate my lights with it. Am so glad I have one😁

Originally I thought "I'm happy with my 1st Gen Show so why upgrade"? The difference between the 1st and 2nd Gen Show is night and day. The size of the screen, improved speakers and new features make it well worth upgrading. I love my 1st Gen Show and REALLY love my 2nd Gen Show.

This is a great device, we use it daily for schedules, weather, recipes, music etc. However, when asking for any information, you must be very specific in your request, unlike Google Assistant which will capture generalities and ferret out the information. Also the Echo is not good with distance or directions.

Great sound and picture quality. How many of us actually look at the pictures we take on our cell phones. With Amazon Photos we actually look at them and this one feature is enough for me. Everything else is a perk!
The screen sucks I would love a large alarm clock display because I can’t see at night that’s why I bought the darn thing 86.

reviews.reviewTitle: Can’t believe great sound for this price
reviews.reviewText: Works best if have amazon prime and unlimited music. Like having own DJ and works well w teenagers in household too. Not all songs have lyrics. And Echo needs specific version of songs instead asking which version you may like. But really cool I’m that it really understand everyone’s accent and age related voices too.
Very nice upgrade from Gen 1, but the voice recognition is not as good. The screen and sound quality are big improvement over the first generation which is why it is still a 4 and worth the upgrade.

Great addition to our home. Great picture. Video chatting works great. Music sounds very nice. Love access to SiriusXM. Settles lots of debates. Grocery list is fantastic with the app on my phone. Very helpful tool.

I have the Echo Show in my kitchen. I use it to turn on lights throughout my house, play music while cooking, look up recipes, add item to my Alexa Shopping List, etc. It is a nice addition to my Echo devices - love the screen.

Voice recognition is terrible on the Echo Show. I ask for something and it gives me something entirely different. If I make the same request on my echo or echo dot they get it exactly right. This unit is frustrating. It will be interesting to see if this complaint falls on deaf ears. Amazon is customer review more for show? Honestly I think I just through $180.00 away.

reviews.reviewTitle: A great experience in its own right!
reviews.reviewText: The Echo Show 2nd generation is a fantastic product and meets all expectations in relationship to Amazon and voice commands - very cool! The reason I have not given it 5-stars is because it does not work with Sonos as all advertising leads you to believe. Yes, you can control your Sonos speakers by voice command from the ES, but the ES speaker is not recognized by Sonos, so it is not included in the speaker group. I purchased the ES to replace a Sonos speaker in a room, but now do not have the option to play it in a group - very disappointing!

reviews.reviewTitle: No front speakers! Very hard to hear
reviews.reviewText: No front speakers. You literally have to stand behind it or bump it up against the wall for the sound to push forward. I very much dislike the new speaker design! I have to blare the volume in order to hear it now. I wish I had not upgraded from the 1st generation.

It scared the $@!& out of me!!! 10:30 pm, no one is in the kitchen where the Amazon Show is (I am alone and upstairs) and it just starts playing the loudest EDM with very strange lyrics. I immediately unplugged and I’m giving it away ASAP. For the few days I had it I found it very difficult to navigate and Alexa wasn’t very helpful. I would much rather just use my Apple products.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not reliable at all. No tech help available.
reviews.reviewText: Worked fine for two weeks. Since then it goes from working at 90% to not working at all. Two calls to tech support resulted in no help. Right now I pretty much have a boat anchor. Not happy with this product.
Too much bass even with the bass all the way to 0 it has the same amount of bass so basically what I'm saying is The Equalizer is useless and Amazon is lying to us their so-called equalizer fix

I bought this on amazon prime day and absolutely love it! And the price was awesome, I saved $100 off the regular price! I wish they would do more Prime Days... I now turn my lights on and off with a simple command. I also got the ring which I cant wait to start using as well!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Better video and sound than i expected
reviews.reviewText: Bought this because I could barely see my blink camera feeds on my echo spot. I was also using the spot to play music but had it wired to a boombox just so that I could really hear it. Was very surprised at the audio quality from the 2nd gen show. Great bass and excellent volume output. Plus, now I can easily see from several feet away my blink camera feeds. Really, very impressed with the Dolby quality audio from this upgrade.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great addition to our Alexa home.
reviews.reviewText: Our home feels like an Alexa home, this and other Alexa enabled products work well together. I have one of the echos in my kitchen. It gives me hands free recipes i can read and music, movies, tv show, ect. We also have reminders set on it.

I can't figure out how to sync it with my Roku TV or lighting system in the house, I ask it simple questions and keeps telling me I don't know the answer to that... It's pretty much just good for streaming music, the sound quality is superb! But I don't think it's worth the price.. it doesn't even sync with YouTube..

Music, games, intercom, home controls, Alexa support, all in one. Bought camera for $25 for grandson baby monitor and it works great. Went in to purchase Echo Plus and so glad I spent the exta $75. Put Echo Dot in son’s room and dropping in for dinner call is worth the total cost alone.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as responsive as other Alexa devices and no Netflix
reviews.reviewText: Sounds good and has a good picture but difficult to navigate. It doesn’t respond to the same commands as Alexa does. For instance, if you are listening to music or playing a video and tell it to stop or pause, it won’t respond. Also disappointed that you can’t play Netflix on it, only Amazon Prime or Hulu.

reviews.reviewTitle: The screen makes the Echo so much better..
reviews.reviewText: The biggest surprise to me was how great the sound is in this machine . Much better than any other Echo .. I bought the optional stand so I can pivot it for a better viewing angle, very much worth getting . Video playback is spot on and going to YouTube is very very easy extremely happy and satisfied ...👍

The sound in this little thing is awesome. I bought Amazon Prime which includes over 2 million songs in Amazon music. Any song or artist that comes into your mind, you ask her to play and she does. I also bought it for the purpose of cooking with it. Haven't tried it yet. I am looking forward to it.

Alexa is SO MUCH FUN! She is very helpful and says some of the funniest stuff (when asked certain questions! LOL My kids have fun learning from her. She can do so many things I’m still learning what she does. Very satisfied with this purchase! :D

Remove the "Try..." banner garbage and its easily a 5..

*Update* Bumping up to a 2. Amazon called within 20 minutes and asked me for my feedback, which I did. If they fix the issue, I'll bump to a 5.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good sound, touchscreen, hears well even with loud background
reviews.reviewText: Sounds good works good. Surprised at how well things are displayed on the screen. When I use a command for light a brightness and other controls for light appears on screen. It is touch screen too... Also surprised. The bass seems to vibrate the enclosure maybe it's the stand I have it on. Will be doing some testing on that when I can but the bass is there.
Great product. I’ve had it for about three weeks now and still get a kick out of thinking of new things to have it do for me like greet me when I come home with a greeting , music, and the news.

We originally bought one for my grandparents for Christmas since the mic went out on their iPad and they video chat with family all the time. We ended up buying two more because it was so great. One for us and one for my husband’s parents.

reviews.reviewTitle: Alexa do you hear me?? YES YOU DO!
reviews.reviewText: Replaced my first gen Echo Show because she hears me better and the Bluetooth is way better! The bigger screen is awesome too, I use this in the kitchen hooked to Bluetooth speakers and Sonos. We love it oh and you can get to youtube on it!

I like this device a lot. My only complaint is that it doesn’t always play a video when I ask it to. I like that it has the option for karaoke and to view my son on his baby monitor. The speakers are also amazing
We love this model of Alexa. Great sound quality and love the screen so you can see what you are asking about. I listen to my Amazon music everyday! You will not regret this purchase.
I can watch prime video while I clean the kitchen, video or phone call my husband, announce to the kids upstairs, see my calendar, and it gets really loud at top volume. Love it so much

Extremely happy with this 2nd Gen model. Larger screen, sound quality, unit construction and optional adjustable stand all make this an excellent upgrade over the 1st Gen. Find a spot to relocate your 1st Gen Show (in my case, moved from the Family Room to a Home Office) and replace it with the 2nd Gen. You wont be disappointed.

I have received at least two replacements for the 1st & 2nd show, each show I had for less than eight months. The issues were either the with the screen flickering or no sound when Alexa is speaking or through video chat. I will replace the show one more time, after that I will get a refund.

Works well with Ring doorbell, other Alexa devices, and my IP cameras. Unfortunately it sometimes has no sound. Factory reset brings it back, but that's a pain. Usually cycle power until sound comes back.

This is our first purchase of an Alexa product and we are so glad we waited for the Echo Show. I love the routines, ease of use, and I love it so much I want to get all my family members one for Christmas

After using an Echo Dot, we decided to try the Show. Once we plugged it in, we were impressed by the features and sound quality. GREAT PRODUCT. We would liek to see it be able to integrate with Google Duo though.

reviews.reviewTitle: I like it more than I thought I would!
reviews.reviewText: At first I wasn't sure what use I have for this, but music in the kitchen is the #1 use and asking it the weather is the 2nd. Here and there we use it for some things, but it is redundant with your iPhone. Sound and picture is great.

If you plan to purchase primarily to watch shows.... don't. Voice recognition is poor for shows and movies. Also, my device has a tendency to not play the show even when it does recognize the show, or just randomly stop in the middle of playing the show, or otherwise start glitching. Sound has a weird rattling noise for certain bass tones.

Still learning how to use it... Love the sound! Makes it much easier to view a recipe or a DIY video from youtube.
Having the screen always on is kind of annoying. Managed to display my photos as background - nice feature.

reviews.reviewTitle: Makes me sound like a crazy person.
reviews.reviewText: Other than the fact I have to yell at it more than my kid, it’s fine. The only problem is that she just doesn’t listen, I have to yell so loud that everyone knows my business. Just the other morning my neighbor asked me if I remembered to take my pills because she heard me yelling for Alexa to set a reminder.

Easy to set up and easy to use. I bought one for my son for Christmas and he bought one for me. Now I can talk and see my grandchildren everyday. My grandson just turned 4 yesterday and all he say is Alexa call Grammy which he does several times a day. I love it!
It doesn't support netflix, and what seems like only a lite version of Hulu that's hard to navigate.
Lo que no me agrado es que no tiene integrado el idioma español y mi pronunciación no es muy buena en inglés, a veces tengo q repetir hasta q me entienda, por todo lo demás estoy muy satisfecha 😀
It doesn’t link or help me hook to any of my other amazon devices. It doesn’t work with ring doorbell. What am I supposed to do with this?

reviews.reviewTitle: All is great but no adjustable camera
reviews.reviewText: You would think after the first generation the camera could be adjustable! Thats all. Everything is great. Videos are clear sound fills a good size kitchen. Lots of nice features visible on the screen

just another dust collector still trying to figure out why people need these things in their life, only one getting anything out of these is amazon when they get your money for yet another dust collector:)

I had the original show and am so glad I upgraded! This screen is so much bigger/better. I love watching Hulu on it while I'm cooking! I also love that it has a web browser. The sound is great also! To anyone questioning upgrading I would highly recommend doing it!
The kids love it. They sit and watch the lyrics of their favorite songs and more. Can't wait to see all the things that the Echo Show will bring.

reviews.reviewTitle: But this, it will enhance your life
reviews.reviewText: Live this device. Purchased 2 more. Music sounds versatile, Alexa answers questions quickly. Often gets the weather forecast totally wrong - but gets the immediate temperature correct.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as nice as I thought it would be
reviews.reviewText: Still learning what it can do but so far am disappointed. Was much harder to set up a calendar that I expected, hardly worth the effort. If everything else is as hard I should have just stayed with my echo which I really like and not spent the money for the show.
If you love yelling at a device that cannot compute then go ahead and purchase this item!!!!
If you ask it to play a movie it plays a song that you never heard of or try’s to start an audio book. Ask it to play a prime video and says hmmm I don’t no that
Boyfriend HATES tv. I can’t sleep without it. Hulu on here has been a LIFESAVER. Thank you!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good way to stay in touch with Mom
reviews.reviewText: Bought two, one for 87 year old Mom, one for me, now all she has to do is holler to Alexa to call me, if she falls down and can't get up!! We talk face to face all the time and she does not have to deal with any electronics just talk to Alexa!

reviews.reviewTitle: Sit back and feel the new Echo Show!
reviews.reviewText: Upgraded for sure!! This new Echo Show really turns up the volume with it's new sound system and 10" display it really packs some power and has become the centerpiece on my coffee table in my living room . This was deffinatly worth upgrading to.

The screen is great and my photos all look crisp and very HD. I like that you can switch back and forth between voice commands and touch screen commands with things like smart bulbs and plugs. I did think the sound was going to be better though.

reviews.reviewTitle: A lot to improve on video collection, great sound quality.
reviews.reviewText: Great sound quality. But, video collection is really bad compared to google home hub. Once I realized, it can't show youtube, I started to feel like this is kind of useless. I am mainly using it as a wireless speaker.

Although the Bluetooth connects and I can see what song is playing, where's it at in the track so far, etc.. there is no volume. I have to disconnect and reconnect the blue tooth multiple times to get it started.

Love the convenience and ease of use. As a family we use this to communicate with each other. My dad, sisters, nieces, grandkids have them. It is so nice to have the option to see who I am speaking with, especially when a group is together at one residence and you call and are able to see everyone and chit-chat.

Love the show, like to sing along with the music and to view cooking recipes and the videos of how its made. It has movies and youtube videos too. Tells you on the screen of all the things that you can ask her which helps me.

Bought from America and using in New Zealand, had to buy adapter to get it to go. Great unit still learning the use of. But keeping set up for US as if under Australian control I have less functionality as not all features are supported

The Show has a lot of "Promise" but I find it difficult to program, it frequently needs to be re-started and is not very user friendly. I'm sure some of the well documented problems will be worked out eventually but my opinions are based on what I am working with now.

We love our show! Works perfectly with all of our other smarthouse gadgets (smart over, microwave, washer and dryer) and works with our nest doorbell, door lock, and thermostat. Also works with our Moen u shower controls!!

I love my echo show. I was debating on the 1st Gen. Or 2gen. I happened to be at best buy and they had a packaged deal during black Friday. Totally worth the money. I have 1 Dot and another on the way, because my house is slowly becoming an Alexa home. Wifi bulbs, light switch. Diffuser. Cameras. Love what it all can do. Highly recommend.

We purchased this to have video calls with my elderly mother. The set up was simple and the calls are really great. This is a huge quality of life improvement for my mother. She can now contact all of her children this way.

It's very useless, doesn't have as many functions, I was thinking I would come with app and things. But nothing special. It doesn't load the music's all the way, so it stops most of the times in the midle of the song, I have to tell all the time to get screen of. And I I use another alex device the screen come up, even if I'm not in the room. The call never works. If I could give it back I would.

OMG, this is so much better then gen 1, sound is fantastic with great Bass and volume. I am pretty sure I will be trading in my gen 1's or the New Gen 2. The larger screen is so easy on the eyes, and the HD quality is fantastic. if you don't have one of these you are really missing out on something very special.

Love the device and concept but the fact that a smartphone is needed to utilize video calling is a major disappointment I bought 2 of these, 1 for me and one for my parents in their mid-80's who don't have a smartphone.

reviews.reviewTitle: So glad I got this!! Wonderful Quality!!
reviews.reviewText: The sound and bass is amazing!! The picture quality is insane, and it comes with so many features!! If you want to turn your home into an Alexa home, you definitely need to add this addition to your device list!!

Have the first generation Echo show and this one is a vast improvement in both sound and picture quality. I play my Amazon music on this and have the other ones (3) set up as a group for my downstairs. Love the Show!

The product is useless. The only thing it is good for is to check the security cameras. Other then that Alexa will say I dont know to any question you ask or command. If you want a stress free and easy to use device go with google it's way better.

reviews.reviewTitle: Needs more intergration/best smart home hub.
reviews.reviewText: I love almost everything about the show. You can watch prime on it. It will display your calendar, events, reminders, and smart home display is also a lovely feature. I have ring cameras and I’m abale to view each one on the show. One area that could use improvement is entertainment. Amazon currently only has one option for live tv which is Hulu. I know they are intergrating an app for prime on xfinity devices. It would be nice to live stream content from my cable provider. The show is in my kitchen and has taken over as my kitchen tv. Overall this device is incredible and will only get better with more app releases.

the audio is wonderful, improved from the previous generation show, the video is excellent, too bad that I have only ONE of those, and around 5 of the 1st gen Show, purchased short before this one was released. and the trade in value is ridiculous.

I like being able to see and hear my Flash Briefing.
Had an issue keeping it connected to my WiFi, but it seemed to work out itself.
My daughter loved testing Alexa’s ability to play different music.

Biggest regret buying this. Im assuming its defective. And thats why it was on sale. I had it 3 days before it stopped working. No sound comes out. It doesnt listen to compands. Its pretty much useless. When i ask her questions. She doesn't answer. When I try to watch something no sound comes out. She wont turn on lights. I factory reseted it. And this time two days later she stopped working again. Same thing. I shouldn't have to factory reset it every couple days for it to work. Will be calling customer service.

It's a great thing to have in the kitchen, but Alexa can be a real pain in the behind. Simple tasks, like playing a specific artist confuse her. Even though i try to enunciate clearly, she says something isn't found despite finding 20 seconds ago.
I have the 1st generation, now with the 2nd generation it is absolutely awesome and contemplating on purchasing and other. Thank you for an awesome product. Thank you very much

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazon won’t send me a replacement for a defective unit?!?
reviews.reviewText: Audio died after two weeks. Ran the troubleshooting and still defective. Amazon is now saying I need to send it back and pay full price instead of just sending me a replacement? They cannot be serious.

Nice little Prime video player and music machine. Nice bass on the sound. Screen is nice. Mine stopped working completely in the first three weeks. I believe is allowing me to return it. It arrived at Amazon three days ago and no word on a refund.
Works well. My family loves it. Music quality is much better than other echo devices. It is nice to have lyrics to play with so many songs. Also integrates with my Ring devices.

I have Alexa, and wanted Echo for christmas. A great product to own. Played Christmas songs in late December. Also so many other issues. Just haven't figured out what else is possible to do. Wish it had a
manual to get ideas.
Definitely an upgrade to the original. I purchased this and we love it. I moved the original to another part of my place. Nice big vibrant screen with better sound quality than the original.

I received this as a gift for Christmas. I LOVE IT! We have since installed the Ring Doorbell and also security cameras so I can see what is going on around my house. We have also used it to talk to family out of state.

Very very disappointed. Long time lag between request and actual action. The volume controls from Alexa app are very slow in responding. Alexa, despite all the new speakers , does not pick up my voice unless I am standing in front of it. A major disappointment. 10 steps backwards from Gen 1. Don’t upgrade. I should have waited

reviews.reviewTitle: Ads are much more enticing than reality.
reviews.reviewText: Primary purpose was to allow live conversations such as Skype, Hangout etc. This has proven cumbersome if not impossible. Also e-mail was received offering a smart plug for $4.99 with a deadline date and for new owners only. Instructions were to as Alexa to order one for the new owner. Alexa could not respond to the request at the reduced price. Additionally I asked Alexa to play "You'll Never Walk Alone" from Carousel. It started the remastered version but stopped half through. My recommendation would be to buy the much cheaper Echo product and forget the high priced "show" item.

Excellent product. Super easy set up, even in comparison to the Echo. I addition to the boss speakers, I am able to watch Netflix while my boyfriend plays video games, and it never gets tired telling my daughter how to spell things. Worth every penny. Also I am able to check in on my baby any time.
I am doing something with this all day! Love it!

Just set up an hour or so ago but loving it! The screen is the right size for us and the picture quality is so much better than the gen 1. The sound quality is great and voice recognition is working better than the old one. I haven’t integrated with anything but my phone. So far it’s worked great!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Don’t like the speakers in the back of unit.
reviews.reviewText: The next one you come out with, please put the speakers back in the front, I like the size of it, but the speakers in the back of the unit is horrible. I have the original echo show and the speakers are in the front and I can hear it good, when I got this one I can’t hear it not so much I have to turn it way up just to hear it. But I like the size. Maybe the next one you come out with will be a lil bit bigger and speakers in the front, that would be awesome.

reviews.reviewTitle: It’s OK, but I would wait to purchase the new generation
reviews.reviewText: I thought this product would be so wonderful. I am a big Alexa fan, but the show is just heavy and the voice recognition and smart home integration is lacking. I wish I would have waited for the new generation

I purchased Amazon Echo prior to purchasing the Show. I paid for the Amazon music only to find out after purchasing the Show I cannot listen to upgraded music on this device unless I I paid more money. This really sinks. Im thinking about cancelong the service and purchase something that 1 price for multiple devices. Other than that I would have rates it a 5.

We are still learning about all it's features. Love having everything come up on the touch screen. Used it to follow along with recipes and to get flight tracking. Having the words show up along with the songs is also fun.
However, I have a prepaid cell phone and can't get it to do video calling. I hope we can get this to work because video calling is the main feature we want to use it for.

So far this is working great. Easy to set up and link to our Ring doorbell, Wyse security camera and TP Link smart plug. We got this as a Xmas present from our kids and have had several video calls with them. Simple to operate. Just now exploring other options.

So far I really like it. It's nice to see info as well as hear it. I noticed Alexa doesn't seem to be as good as my older products, it doesn't understand every command the first time...maybe I started talking poorly. Hopefully more apps will take advantage of the screen.
I purchased this on Prime day and I am so happy with my decision. This is really amazing. Sound quality is so amazing that I cannot explain. I am very very happy with my decision to purchase this.

This unit makes a excellent match unit to my Ring door bell and my Blink cameras providing great views of the exterior of my home. Additionally the functions as our electronic assistant is beneficial along with the 4 other Echo devices we have through out our house.

I bought this for myself as a Christmas present this year. I am so happy I finally did it. My kids and I love being able to play music, watch videos and get information right in our kitchen. Having the option to pull up recipes and see my front door when my doorbell rings...so cool!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Some trouble registering a new Show
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a new Shoe and received it before Christmas. When I started setting it up today, I had an issue registering it to my account. I contacted Amazon and received a call within an hour. Everything was cleared up and all is currently good.

I absolutely love this device. I got this yesterday, the setup was pretty much straight forward. I already have the fire tv cube and this device is some sort of a mini version. Although I can't get much of the subscription to work but at least I can watch videos with it. And having YouTube viewing capability is really a great feature.

The generation 2 show is the way to go. The screen is good quality and the sound kills the first generation hands down. the bass hits really hard, I even had to turn the bass down. You will love the quality and the option of skills that you have.

We replaced one of our Dots with the Show and really like the display and the sound quality. For whatever reason, the Show has a harder time hearing and understanding us than the Dot, so that can be a tad frustrating. I really like being able to look at my Ring camera on demand with the Show; and I also like the on-screen responses to commands.
I love it. I already had yhe gen 1 model. I love the larger screen.

Very disappointed as you must stay plugged in to use this and you cannot even purchase a battery back-up for this 2nd generation device. Other than that, which is a big other, I am satisfied. This should have come with the battery for the price. Thank you

My son and daughter in law got this for us when they moved out of town. This is a fantastic way to keep in touch with them and our grandbabies. We keep it in the kitchen and also use to make our grocery list. We really like and continue to use it more every day.

I purchased this for my wife. now we all use it. lol
she said. I thought this was my gift? lol
the sound is great. it really echo's across the kitchen or room.
if you are not a prime member you might not take full of advantage.

I bought a pair of these for the video calling it mentioned from one unit to the other to have for morning calls from my girlfriend... we find the video is choppy and even the voice has a lag time in it... Apple's face time is far better than this. I have Cox high speed internet and a High speed router/modem from netgear that works fine with all other devices in the house...
Hope in time they get this technology right...

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo Show is a great tool.
reviews.reviewText:
The only problem is the lag time in conversation. Seems we are talking over each other in face to face conversations.
I also love adding grocery items and reminders as a senior citizen.

I've only had this echo show for maybe a month or two and on several occasions the sound just stops working. It's almost as if a mute button has been hit, except no one has touched it. Unplug and plug back in has always resolved the issue so far but super annoying to say the least.
I like the bigger screen and better sound than the first edition I bought.

Love the echo show - sound is great for music, the voice is a bit loud no matter what, love the screen for using while cooking to display recipes... I'm sure there is more since I haven't explored the full extent of what Alexa can do.

It is a very high quality instrument. Very good screen resolution and pretty good sound quality. Very easy to setup, most steps are automatic. I would like to see more controls on the phone App so I could customize all the features remotely.
No the speaker were broke. Called they r coming to get this one and replace it. I am proud to say this company never let me down yet

reviews.reviewTitle: Great addition to smart home, a must have. choose over echo plus.
reviews.reviewText: Love it, great addition to smart home, waited to buy. Made decision for show over echo plus. Simple to use and set up. Even adding Phillip hue bulb was simple. Can't wait to expand my smart home
Did not care for this product at all. Does not show a lot of email at one time and does not an actual calendar but only line items. Also keeps showing item of interest even though tried to block.
I like sound and picture quality, however responses seem a little slow.. I would like better control of my screen display ie: continuous weather display or turning off continuous suggestions.
Very happy with my Show. Have a bit of trouble with voice recognition but I am told I mumble at times so its not Alexas fault. Very good sound. More than happy with sound.
there is no option to turn off the annoying ask alexa to... suggestions at the bottom of the screen

This product fails to perform the most basic functions. The first one I received had broken speakers so I ended up getting a replacement. The second one fails to play certain Amazon video content. Additionally, and most importantly, this $200 product cant even function as an alarm clock. I set an alarm for 6:30am every morning but it doesn’t go off half the time. (Seems like it is going off according to the screen but no sound) I would return it in a heartbeat if I didn’t throw away the box/packaging.

reviews.reviewTitle: Needs six stars for sound. Really sounds awesome.
reviews.reviewText: System came setup for me so no real setup issues. If this unit had hdr led or oled it would be perfect. Sound is outstanding works with ring system perfect. Arlo also. And nest works fine with it.

I have 1st Gen & now 2nd Gen Echo shows and a Dot I love them all. Once you get the hang of it it's invaluable you can do so much. Reminders, calendars, Set a routine to turn lights off on etc. I don't know how we ever lived without them ! Can't wait for the car one to come out !
I thought that I say will be delivered in three days but its going to be weeks! Alexa's a bad girl!

I got the 2nd gen Show as a Birthday gift. It replaced the 1st gen I had in my kitchen. I love both, but the larger screen on the 2nd gen makes it a truly great experience. I highly recommend this product for those that need a larger display for their day to day activities.
My daughter sent this to me so we could have better video chats which we do. There is a lot that it does and I'm still learning. Sure there is more to do if you are signed up with any amazon extras.

Love the clear display and Alexa’s sound recognition is great, I can do it from across the room. I can listen to music and watch Hulu, I have been bribing it outside at night when we’re sitting outside by the fire pit.

Really enjoying the show. Recently converted to a smart home and are running Alexa and ring as our hub. Everything has been pretty smooth. No regrets here at all! Was super surprised at the sound quality!

I use this in the bathroom in the mornings while I put make up on and get ready for work. The video rarely works, Alexa NEVER understands what I’m saying I have to repeat myself at least 5 times. It will take me to sites that I am not asking for. The voice recognition is just awful! Great speaker and picture but it is more frustrating than useful. Very disappointing!

I don't like the fact that people say she listens to everything you say (Big Brother is watching?).
I like the fact you can pair Alexa with other things (Pandora, Cameras, BlueTooth, etc.). Gives you news and weather.

Didn't think i really needed this but its great. We have it in the kitchen. We use it to see our kasa outdoor cameras, display recipes, play music, watch hulu call the kids on thier echo dots. Simply amazing!

reviews.reviewTitle: My cell phone does all this and more
reviews.reviewText: My cell phone does more than this. Bought if to play Hulu and I can't get all of the content in my Hulu account. Video calls are just as good on the cell phone with Google Duo. No instruction booklet or printed material included in the box. Pretty much sits there unused.

The sound is much better than the 1st gen. I like it a lot, but mine is slow to pick up commands.

Sometimes there’s a delay between saying “Alexa” and the blue light coming on to indicate it’s activated. Other times my Echo dots in other rooms will activate even when I’m right next to this.

I’d exchange it if I didn’t already throw the box away.

Works great. Get a swivel stand for it. Don’t get the ones from China, they swivel very easily. Especially when you try to,type. I had bought two and they both had this problem. I had to slide a piece of paper between the base and the swivel part to make the unit swivel harder, Good Luck . We had to change its name to Echo as we had another Echo device close by. I like the product.

Love the show only wish the camera angle could change. Got it so that we could drop in on our elder parent but the camera angle makes it difficult. Basically, tired of looking at the ceiling. Fix camera. Ceiling nice but seeing elder parent would be nicer.

My girlfriend bought this for me for my birthday, I love it. Enrolled in Amazon music for a low $3.99 a month and I play everything I ask for. Lots of fun for guests...everyone has to have an Echo Show 2nd generation.

this is fantastic bought 2 units so we can see our grandchildren and talk with them easily--enjoy shopping list phone contact ability and calendar ease-getting photos from phone a little harder to do, but we are working on it sound is incredible and can raise and lower volume from 30 feet away-only had units for 5 days still exploring what it can do but we are blown away with video quality and sound quality and can not wait to fully use all it is capable of doing

Listen to songs and see the lyrics. See shopping lists and other lists with just a quick query. Call and talk to friends and family. Great device. I highly recommend it. Even my wife, who is technology challenged, loves it.

I enjoy it a lot. I was upset when I found out it didn't stream Netflix and had to use hulu or prime TV but it's not too horribly annoying. I enjoy what it does do you can play certain games with it, ask it weird questions, and even have it make jokes for you and play music. It's fun overall but it has limitations. Good product, easy to use, and fun to play around with. I'd honestly like to help program these.

I do love this Echo Show 2nd generation albeit not as much as 1st generation. Works well and sound is very good grouped with all my other Echos in other rooms. I love the larger screen. It just doesn’t appear to be as responsive to voice commands - like it doesn’t hear. However I would recommend if asked.

I keep getting an error. I have my house lights in several rooms set up thru the HUE and I have the$18 light bulbs in the light. Amazon will turn them on or off occassionally but I mostly get a message saying they are not responding I cannot even turn the off or on manually using the echo. I can go to my HUE app and it works great. Go to the amazon app and rec the error Server not responding. I have turned this in 3 times via the mobile app and I just get a message someone will contact me shortly . I do not consider a week as shortly

Very heavy on the bass. I adjusted the settings to the lowest possible bass but still a lot of bass bumping which isn’t ideal when you live in an apartment. the sound quality on my prior echo show was crisper

Had the device for two days and the sound broke. I have to ship this back and amazon will send a new one. I already synced all my devices to this one so I’ll have to do that all over again. Sound shouldn’t stop working when it’s brand new.

reviews.reviewTitle: Definitely worth it for the larger size!
reviews.reviewText:
Nothing to dislike! This works actually "better than Average" with fast ans accurate responses!
A bit pricey for the larger size, but it is easy to use and provides amazing sound as well. Worth it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Moved up from the First Generation
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised at the Quality of the sound from this upgrade and I like the extra size as well. My wife talks to it regularly while she is at the kitchen Table eating.

I love my Echo Show nice size and stylish I use it in my kitchen when cooking or listen to music 🎶 when cleaning, love that it can interact with Alexa still need to see what else it does. Very happy 😊 with this purchase.

It was a mother's day gift and I honestly didn't think I was going to use it but it's great! I use it in the kitchen while cooking/cleaning I listin to music or catch up on my YouTubers.. also used for picture display when guests are over it's also fun to ask it random questions.. sound quality is better then I thought also.

I basically got it for my ring front door camera which it works fantastic very good sound and picture among so many other things that it can do.. still trying to figure out how I can tell it to show me the camera on my TV open to any suggestions
I love my Echo Show 2nd generation, I had the 1st generations I returned it after 10 months screen issues. The sound is really good, fantastic base, easy pairing, bigger screen great color.

reviews.reviewTitle: Video calling dosent work as expected
reviews.reviewText: Very disappointed, the video does not always work when you make a video call , for some reason it says video is turned off , but I never turn it off , I don’t why it’s doing that , after a couple try’s, it starts working again

I traded my 1st Gen Echo Show in and received a nice credit as well as 30% off on the Gen 2. The screen is beautiful and overall design much improved. I wish it would come with a stand (sold separately), but that is not a big deal... Highly recommend.

I actually like this way more than my other echos. The sound from the speakers is fantastic in comparison to the regular echo. The screen is nice too. I actually got it as a gift thinking I really did t need one but I was wrong I needed this!

My husband and I love this thing. We are having fun playing music we haven't heard in years. There is a learning curve, but we're getting it. I bought a few smart plugs, and now Alexa turns our lights on when we walk through the door.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy Installation! Quick to set up!
reviews.reviewText: Very responsive. I have my Echo Show in the kitchen and use it for tv when I'm cooking and also to pull up recipes from the internet. Great display and sound. I have added quite a few games and other fun stuff to my Alexa app and enjoying the company :)

Love my new Echo Show. The sound is great and the screen can be seen better than on Echo Spot. I love how I can have my photos cycle through like a digital picture frame. I liked it so much I bought a second one. It's a great Echo device.
Just love this new version. Beautiful screen and fantastic sound quality. I use it by my bed. I replaced the first version of the show (which I liked too) but this really upgraded the experiences.
Love my show. I video chat with my daughter every morning. It’s like she is here with me. Love the music, love everything about it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works well although volume is on the slightly low side
reviews.reviewText: Works well. The visual confirmation of certain information is much welcome. sound quality is good but gave 4 stars because the volume could be made louder. I suspect the speaker output is somewhat limited.

reviews.reviewTitle: “Alexa” is a pleasure to talk to and get to know.
reviews.reviewText: I received this as a gift from my family at retirement. I can honestly say I have totally enjoyed having “Alexa” around the house. I couldn’t imagine buying one for myself but now that I have one, I can’t imagine why I never did. “Alexa” has made a believer out of me.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great device, wish I had purchased six days later
reviews.reviewText: I bought this second generation Echo show to complement my first generation Echo Show, allowing streaming of content from my Fire Recast TV and listening to music from Amazon Prime and as auxiliary bluetooth speakers. The sound is excellent and the larger screen, relative to the first generation one is great. Regrettably, the price dropped 25% or $50 a six days after I bought it and apparently, Amazon no longer offers a refund for items which drop in price within a week of purchase.

I read a review that this echo would “hear” me better. It’s not any better than the over versions. Feels clunky when using it. Not a good buy. Maybe in the future it will have more features, better interaction and easier to use.
I really enjoy this product. I wish however that they would send information on where you can purchase all the things it can do!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Even Better than the first gen
reviews.reviewText: I have a first generation Echo Show which I am very happy. But this 2nd generation is amazing. The larger screen makes viewing a pleasure you can even watch a movie. The sound is unbelievable
So far I am getting use to this device. I like the system so far and I know there is more to come! I have connected my smart devices and happy they all work great together. Get you one!

From beautiful echo spot the awesome Echo Show. Must need gadget at home. Hes my eyes to ring camera, my weatherman, my radio, my dictionary, my enclopedia, she plays youtube almost everything you need just with your voice. Alexa listens.

I am enjoying the Echo Show very much. The sound and the screen clarity are both really good. I moved an Echo Dot from the kitchen and replaced it with this device - now I'm able to do so much more; such as view recipes, videos, etc.
I have ordered a Amazon echo for every member in my family. This latest Echo Show is for ME!! I love them, they are the greatest

reviews.reviewTitle: We upgrade from the 1st gen to the 2nd and happy we did!!
reviews.reviewText: I love the 2nd gen echo show. We had the 1st gen and upgraded to the 2nd gen when it came out. The sound quality is mind blowing compared to the 1st Gen. The screen is much larger its great for watching shows, cooking recipes, sing alongs with the kids. Hands down I love the 2nd gen show and all the great features that offers!!

I would have been much happier if it would have came with an instruction booklet I'm having difficulty putting things on my Alexa generation 2 echo show calling in for echo service it's okay when I would like to be able to read it out of a booklet and be able to do it myself

The Echo show really is a neat product. The only issue I have is more with Alexa than with this specific unit. When amazon tells you a WiFi speaker is certified to work with Alexa, you buy it, then find out you can’t group it to multi room music. That’s not certified to me.

Really like it. The sound is very good. Been enjoying Christmas carols. Screen is big enough to comfortably see from a decent distance. Only thing I do not like is it doesn’t let me know that I have a notification like on the dot (light turns green). All in all I am satisfied.
The Echo Show blows them out of the water. Great sound quality. Love the feature where you can call friends and family for a face to face conversation on the Echo Show. So many fun features.
My favorite Echo device. I have mine on the kitchen counter. I use it often for grocery list, pulling up recipes and setting kitchen timers. When not in use it rotates my pictures on the display.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sounds great but needs some work on vooce recognition
reviews.reviewText: The show 2 definately does no pock up voocr across the room as good as Gen 1 tower Echo. Had the send back 1 unit asbit wouldnt recogize voice - just a blue bar and no action.
I’ve read several reviews from people experiencing the same issue I’m having. NO SOUND. Amazon knows about this and is silent on the issue. How’s that for customer service?

I was torn between getting the Google assistant hub or the Amazon Echo Show. I decided on the Echo Show and I do not regret my choice. I so love my New toy. My husband loves her too. I am in the process of connecting it to all my smart devices. I can ask Alexa pretty much anything and she is able to provide me with the info I was looking for. I’m still finding out all the things she can do.

Best purchase ever!!!! I am extremely satisfied with my echo show! It is everything and them some....I have echi dots and one echo spot in every room. I wanted the echo show for my video doorbell and I'm overjoyed!!!!

I'm a huge Echo user, the new Shows are a fantastic new addition. The large screen is very bright and crisp, great for photos and looking out of your ring cameras and doorbell. The bass is the best yet, very rich sound. We are loving them.

Very nice clear diaplay. Some times it has a bit too much bass ass it walks across my counter when i have music playing. Price was a little too steep but we use it daily and have since I bought it when it came out.

reviews.reviewTitle: Depends on what you want to use if for
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to be able to access Pinterest and use my saved recipes. But I can’t so I’m still forced to use my phone or laptop. I’m not seeing the huge value to having the screen. You’d be better off with a cheap iPad or kindle that has apps

Pro: It's always listening, waiting to do your bidding.
Con: It's always listening.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to set up @ link smart home devices. Great sound quality!
reviews.reviewText: I love the sound & size of the screen of the Echo Show 2nd gen. It linked all my Hue lights easily, was a snap to set up. Since I didn’t want to wait for several weeks for anAmazon order, I was able to buy one at Best Buy.

I enjoy the visual aspect. I enjoy cooking and the recipes are there talking to my friends, ability to show a new upgrade to my home. Visual reminder of appointments and the latest news and weather plus watching movies. Still learning...
Got it so I can view my cameras it works fairly well just takes a little longer to get the view then I would like

reviews.reviewTitle: Poor purchase, Doest work as should
reviews.reviewText:
Have had for a short while
This thing was a poor purchase

Bad bad purchase
