Nice size screen, good sound, sometimes it takes more than once to wake Alexis. It surprised me once when I asked for a baseball score and Alexa showed me the highlights of the game. But it only happened once??? But it’s a box full of surprises and it’s always learning as well as teaching.
Have had a lot of fun getting to know everything you can do with this. Great Christmas present!!!!!
The 2nd Gen sounds better, The screen is bigger. I highly recommend this generation. I love the echo show better. I highly recommend getting the 2pack. I also recommend getting the Fire TV Cube.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound and picture. Alexa is really dense however
reviews.reviewText: Great sound and picture. Alexa CONSTANTLY gets confused about video, even with specific episode instuctions. Also Alexa doesn't understand "stop", "stop playing", "end video", "off" etc... when a video is playing. You must touch the pause button on the screen.

Just amazing how quickly you get used to the features of the Echo Show. Love being able to hear whatever music I'm in the mood for, just by asking for it. The sound quality is just unbelievable. I keep it on my kitchen counter so it's easy to get recipes, but very easy to move around when I want music closer by.

reviews.reviewTitle: The only complaint is the camera is angled a little too far up.
reviews.reviewText: If the camera had more control, a forward tilt, or did facial recognition and following, that'd be the next step in improving this. Really enjoy this, and it works great for recipes. We keep ours in the kitchen.
Enjoy being able to read the lyrics to songs playing. Still learning but was hoping it would “do” more. Looks cool on the counter. Could make a real nice paperweight for the office? ;-)

We bought two, one for us and one for my son and his family (mainly our granddaughter) who are relocating away from us. This is the "mom" way of saying no excuse to call. We have not used it yet for it's intended purpose but set up was a breeze. The screen is awesome. And though I would rather that little family be across town, I can't wait for the day my granddaughter tells Echo to call JoJo.
I do really enjoy this. I have a smart light and I love that I can be lying in my bed and get the light turned off with out getting up. I also love that there are recipes on the show!!

It’s a little hard to figure out how Alexa show works. Trying to set up a on and off schedule for lights is very difficult.
The music is great. It’s a lot of fun with jokes and etc.

reviews.reviewTitle: All-new Echo Show (2nd Gen) – Premium sound and a vibrant 10.1” HD screen - Charcoal
reviews.reviewText: The Echo Show does not stay connected to blue tooth speakers, it does say it is connected on the screen but does not have any sound coming from anywhere. Not even the Echo Show its self. You have to disconnect then reconnect when this happens. very dissatisfied about this, all other features so far work Great.
Piece of junk , speaker stoped working twice. Will not disarm my alarm , can not function fire tv unless I use my phone, no battery. What a waste of time.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works with Ring doorbells and camera.
reviews.reviewText: I'm a senior and it helps me with shopping lists and reminders of many things and announces when there is motion or a doorbell ring on my Ring doorbell 2 and Ring security cameras. We love it! Sometimes it has trouble understanding what you say to it but that could be because I wear dentures, LOL!

reviews.reviewTitle: There are so many things you can do with Alexa
reviews.reviewText: We got it mostly for video calling, and it works great for that. Sometimes it can't retrieve information we ask for or the information is old or incorrect. The weather and other information are spot-on and very helpful. I use the timer and alarm feature a lot. I love that it is hands-free so that I can be doing other things while using it. All-in-all I think it's great and can do so many things!

The interface needs work. It simply isn't ready for only voice commands. It works 50% of the time but it's like a puzzle to figure out what to say to get it to work. Sounds great when it works though.

reviews.reviewTitle: Check the lights the pair up with your Amazon unit.
reviews.reviewText:
We bought this device to marry up with the controls for our lighting in our house and the ring doorbell that we have at the front door.
ring doorbell set up perfectly and easily along with the added ring sound that we plugged into the electrical outlet by the front door.
The lights work great with the huge light but not the other one that was recommended buy Amazon. We never could get the other ones to pair up.

reviews.reviewTitle: THE SHOW DID NOT WORK RELIABLY.
reviews.reviewText: I PRUCHASED THE SECOND GENERATION SHOW TO INSTALL AT MY FATHER'S HOUSE. HE IS 84 YEARS OLD AND I WANTED THE DEVISE FOR EASE OF USE AND THE DROP IN COMMUNICATION. I HAVE FOUND THAT I HAVE TO KEEP RESETTING THE DEVISE BECAUSE THE SOUND STOPS WORKING. IN A FEW INSTANCES THE DEVISE QUIT WORKING. UNFORTUNATELY I FEEL I SPENT ALOT OF MONEY FOR SOMETHING THAT IS NOT RELIABLE.

Love the look! I'd tell you about the sound quality, but this morning, after I asked her the night before to set my alarm, she didn't make noise! Hubby turned her sound down to nothing!
Give me awhile and I'll do a better review!

At first it was great, but after a few weeks it just started going crazy. The screen will go to things to try and it doesn't respond until I turn it off and back on. A lot of times it doesn't recognize me and a lot of other times it just starts answering something for no reason.
I do like that a lot of the songs on Amazon music it shows the lyrics.
I actually had mixed feelings about getting this Alexa product, however, after having her for a few weeks, my husband and I really like having her around! She answers any and all questions!

So I saw this was on sale at a good price so I bought one even though I already had the echo. I did not expect a large screen and then I saw it. The display is very clear and easy to navigate. I enjoy the fact that I can video chat with it and also display pictures when it is not being used.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not all that it’s advertised to be
reviews.reviewText: Not an easy set up if you are not familiar with the Alexa system. “Try this” banner across the bottom is just annoying. And it seems susceptible to over heating (I’m guessing that’s the problem) when in a sunny area and it stops responding and playing music. Support has been weak at best
I expected it to be more functional like the Amazon tablets but it's not. Have to rely heavily on talking to Alexa.

Got the Echo for Christmas and am really enjoying using it.
Starting in the morning with the weather, to football scores the night before. Recipes options, random questions to
daily reminders.
I also appreciate that Amazon suggests different tasks and questions that I would not have thought of.
We use the video call with family all the time. The proper camera angle removes one of my chins, so I look much younger!

reviews.reviewTitle: This is such a great addition to the family.
reviews.reviewText: Life is so busy these days. With my Echo I video call my grandkids, create my shopping lists, check the weather, hear my daily briefing, Alexa even tells me a daily joke. At first I wasn't sure what I would do with this, now I can't imagine my house without it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Revised my rating. Love the echo show.
reviews.reviewText: I initially gave the echo show one star for not working with my wyze camera (the reason I bought it). Amazon support contacted me and the problem is solved. Maybe rebooting my router helped? Anyway, I love all the features of the echo show. It has a large screen that can be seen from across a room. Great sound and great price point. The skills are are big advantage to integrating new devices. Thanks Amazon!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Works good. Glad I got it.
reviews.reviewText: Works good. Nice screen size. It’s capable of so much we haven’t used every function. Easy to use for Ring doorbell which is why we got it in the first place.
Awesome upgrade over the original Show. Sound kicks butt and picture is great for a smaller screen.

reviews.reviewTitle: Well worth the upgrade from my 1st Gen. Echo Show
reviews.reviewText: Larger screen size is a plus. Sound quality is great. Recognizes my voice from the next room.

reviews.reviewTitle: Echo show MOVES when playing music
reviews.reviewText: Nice picture sound, BUT CAUTION!!! this thing moves if playing music, almost had it drop off the table the first time I used it. Don't know what i will do to stabilize it
It takes it time to wake up, but it is fantastic in the kitchen for recipes. I dont care much how it has to be in the primary account holder for movies.

A couple of weeks ago when I first got this device, the screen would come on when I came in the room where it was located, now nothing. Also, the screen goes black after about 10 minutes so if you ask Alexa to set a time for more than 10 minutes, nothing happens. Also, if you have something on the screen you're using like a recipe forget it if you need to see it for more than 10 minutes. Back to Siri for a timer. I'm not sure why Amazon made this item.

reviews.reviewTitle: A good buy but has its glitches
reviews.reviewText: The only reason I didn’t give five stars is I’m having to reboot it because she loses her sound.

reviews.reviewTitle: Still learning all of the features
reviews.reviewText: I love the display and the fact that it stays (doesn't timeout) when I am following a recipe! I LOVE all of the Alexa products....they definitely can contribute to laziness....don't have to get out of my chair to look anything up and don't have to type anything. She is always there for me!!!

I now have three echo devices in my home... Big Brother are you listening??? Love them, and this latest version of of screen is great... love it.... looking forward to getting another, just don't know where t put it yet!

One out of 5 questions asked she will answer. Did I get a bad Echo? A simple question turns into a "we can play a game" when I never asked about a game. Probably should have waited for another version as not at all happy with this one.

I like being able to see the lyrics of a song, ask to see my front door or any other camera. The sound quality is also great. My only complaint is it doesn't seem to hear you and I have to raise my voice to get it to repond at times.
2nd gen echo show is even better than the first. Bigger screen and it sounds great! I still love my first echo show but the 2nd gen is waaay better!
I have mine in my kitchen and it is amzing! I listen to Pandora on it while doing dishe or cooking and the hands free is great! The sound quality is amazing!

reviews.reviewTitle: Doesn't work well with another Echo Show2
reviews.reviewText:
I liked the way my first Echo Show 2 was performing, so I got a second one. Now I regret that I have two Echo Show 2 - they do not like to coexist:
1. I have to select only one of the Echo devices to play music from Amazon Unlimited
2. Smart zigbee devices are stuck with the first Echo show I had, and they cannot be controlled by the second Echo Show.

If you have only one Echo Show 2 device, it's great!

reviews.reviewTitle: Awesome sound and easy set up!
reviews.reviewText: The echo show was so easy to set up. It only took a few minutes. The sound quality is amazing! Great product at a great price!

I'm still playing with this, and realizing just how helpful this actually is. Just ordered a smart thermostat to go with it, already hooked up my AV Receiver to it, linked my email and so much other stuff. So much more to learn!!!
I really like the Show. I have 2 Echos and got this Show on Prime days. It is GREAT. At some point I'd like to get another one. Amazing how much she does to make my life easier.
Easy setup. Linked to my ring cameras and door bell easy. Love the news updates in the am . Love my sports update every day. Best money I’ve spent in a long time.
Amazon said it came with a smart light never showed with order that’s the only thing that was the problem then when I called they wanted me to send it back for the bulb not worth all that

The product works very well except for syncing with apple products. I realize Apple and Amazon are competitors, but I believe your tech people could make it easier for us less technical customers to make new products work. I finally got synced with my Apple iPhone, I am otherwise happy.

Really dislike this product. Voice rec is fine. But:

Audio quality is horrendous. Muffled, lumpy bass. Even after setting the bass on the eq to its lowest setting, still bad. Having it close to the wall doesn’t help, but Amazon must realize this device is often used in kitchen or bathroom environments, close to a wall.

Touchscreen is also spotty in quality. Touch is not accurate at all. Reminds me of my old Chumby. Remember those?

The sound and display are awesome! I also use it to show my various cameras. Exactly what I wanted it to do and it does it perfectly. Example "Alexa, show me driveway camera" "Alexa, show me front door"

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound and the video is clean and crisp.
reviews.reviewText: Great addition which adds the depth of video. My only suggestion would be to evolve an Echo Show unit that could be wall mounted. The current Video models must be sitting on counter, shelf, etc. Very nice when working with Amazon photos which allows you to create various albums to utilize as slide shows.
This is a nice upgrade from the Echo Dot.

reviews.reviewTitle: No voice assistant is perfect but this is a great device.
reviews.reviewText: Voice recognition is still something to be desired, it's become a joke between us at the house. All in all works as expected and delivered superior performance to the previous generation.

I’m having trouble with my Alexa
She doesn’t know anything she answers hmmm I don’t know that answer
Doesn’t know George Washington’s Birthday
Can only tell me miles from Portland somewhere other than Maine to Boston
I asked Boston to Portland Maine she could never get it right
Really disappointed

A pleasant surprise: finally, quick and effortless installation! Basically, plug in and follow the prompts. Sturdy build, great image, and dynamic sound. Also, easy set-up of the Philips Hue bulb that came with it.

We purchased the second gen to upgrade our original show in the kitchen. The larger size makes it mush easier to view recipes and videos. The sound quality is far better than the gen 1....great product!
We love it. We have this one in our kitchen. Perfect for the morning news and local weather, we have the smaller ones in each room and can play music throughout the house. Great gadget!

I purchased this to replace an Echo tower and was at first unsure if I'd use the added functionality of the screen. Turns out I love it. It is in my kitchen and it is incredibly handy to play a recipe video or the news. The speaker is impressive with a substantial sub-woofer; that was a nice surprise. I think the audio here is better than in the Echo tower. I often stream audio from my iPhone over bluetooth. The only downside I've found is that I can't cast video from my phone to the Echo Show over bluetooth.

Bought for my wife for Christmas and she loves it! Also purchased a camera and a smart plug which just enhances the use of the echo show. This replaced the echo 1st generation very easy to set up everything transferred easily.

Love it! Pretty good sound. Having a screen is a huge plus in the kitchen. Definitely recommend trying chop chop. Everyone that visits is always amazed at how simple fruits and veggies can be chopped 😉
I'm quite impressed by the speakers in the 2nd gen show. Rather than turn on our home audio receiver, connect with Bluetooth etc, I often just find myself asking Alexa to play one station or another.
I love everything about Alexa. I no longer have to write myself notes. I tell Alexa! Shopping list...reminders..to do list. Listen to music. Answers most of my questions. Love her

I love this device!! I have it in my kitchen and I find myself constantly using it! I highly recommend this device for those of you that have all the latest gadgets!!! This device won't disappoint you!!!

I never thought I would use a product like this Show, but when I saw it in in action at my 93 year old Dad’s house, I was intrigued. I broke down and bought my own. I use it to fill my house with music and for question queries for all the oddball questions that pop into my brain. I can have face contact with a few relatives and I still need to use it to discover programs and receipts.
All the great features of he 1st generation but now with bigger screen, better and louder sound, heavier base and a built in home control center. Very pleased with this upgrade.

such a great device ! I love listening to the songs and sing as echo show shows lyrics !! Hulu is another great addition and I can catch up on my shows while cooking , I am just very happy with it and would recommend for sure !!

reviews.reviewTitle: The Echo Show 2nd Gen is as advertised
reviews.reviewText: The think I like most is how it works with my ring doorbell and my arlo cameras. It is very convenient to just ask Alexa to show me the front door. It also looks good. I recommend the stand for it.

I love everything about it. Picture and sound is a awesome. I use it to control smart home play music with the other 3 Echo’s in every where mode. Weather, recipes, phone calls, etc. I live alone so she is a blessed companion.

We set our show up on the kitchen counter. We use it everyday. The only thing I don’t like, and it could just be Alexa products in general. Is that when someone tries to take over amazon music and it asks if you allow it, you say no and it does it anyway. But the product itself is fantastic.

reviews.reviewTitle: Faboulous faboulous ! Love the echo show!!!
reviews.reviewText: What is not to like about the echo show! The sound is incredibly awesome. I can communicate with other echo show owners. Watch movies. Love reading the lyrics from the songs. Bobby sherman never looked and sounded soooooo goooood!!!!!!!
This thing replaced so many items. It’s my radio, alarm clock, security system monitoring base station, Alexa bridge, calendar, weather station- it goes on.

We have been having such fun with our new Alexa. The music is wonderful, sound quality superb, and the number of songs available is outstanding. This makes all sound equipment we have obsolete. We love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Addition to my Echo Network
reviews.reviewText: I added a Show in my kitchen where the ability to see and read responses is very convenient. The sound quality of the speakers is very, very good. Very happy with the purchase.

I thought I could use it for e-cookbooks, but it only allows for audio. When I need a video, I cant pick what I want to see, it plays whatever is first in the internal search. I thought it would be more like a kindle but with better sound and Alexa capabilities. I'm very dissatisfied with my purchase.
We love being able to have an interactive screen. Skpe calls, singing along viewing lyrics to songs and seeing where you are during an audible reading. My eight year old loves it!

This is my fourth Alexia product in the last 6 months. I really enjoy it. I even bought one and took it to work. Alexia will sometimes make you mad buy playing something you did not ask for , but I am sold on the product.

reviews.reviewTitle: A VERY LARGE STEP ABOVE THE OLDER VERSION OF ALEXA
reviews.reviewText: After seeing this item thru my sister, I ordered two for myself and a friend! We were very impressed with all that it could do. We now have several friends who now own Echo Show.
I love this so much. I use my Alexa mainly for music when I'm cleaning or cooking and I only had a Dot before and this has such great sound and picture I really love it. Easy to set up too.

The Echo Show's addition of video relative to the standard Echo makes it a must have. From music lyrics to weather visualization the graphics add to the experience. The ability to use as a video call or intercom device works well too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use, easy to setup, video quality is great, the audio is good and even my wife can use it.
reviews.reviewText: My Son, Daughter-in-Law, and 20 month old Grand-Daughter contact us frequently from their home through their Android Phone. The video quality is great, the audio is good and even my wife can use it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fun and Helpful But a Couple of Bugs to Fix
reviews.reviewText: Enjoying the Echo Show greatly but there are a couple of bugs to be worked out software wise. Video screen keeps turning off by itself and and personal pics input as a home screen keep disappearing and have to be re-uploaded. Otherwise a fun gadget to have around.

The sound quality and response speed is much, much better than I expected. Bass is impressive at reasonable volumes. I hope that Amazon is working on more uses of these display devices, like the ability to leave messages (visual / text) on the screen for other household members. I think this device could easily be the center of home communication.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wish I bought a show years ago
reviews.reviewText: I started out with the original echo and I’ve since gotten a bunch of dots. Now that I have a show I can’t believe what an amazing piece of equipment this is. Besides the sound being credible it’s like having a hands-free tablet to boot. I can’t say anything but the best for the show. Wish I bought a show years ago I now communicate with my mom and making it quite easy for her.
Absolutely the best Alexa out there! So happy with it. Highly recommended! :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Expect to pay for it to do anything
reviews.reviewText: It does not do much without having to purchase in-app things. Example is trivia of the day. After a couple days you have to pay for it. Outside of the weather really has no use in my home.

Are use it for many things like adding to my grocery shopping list I also ask for it to check my ring doorbell’s to see who’s there and ask many questions I am not sure of. I would definitely recommend this it works great

Since I am home all day (retired) I interact with Alexa constantly and am amazed at how real she seems.

I love the many features that can be done with the system
Worked great for a week but then no sound or volume. Did troubleshooting with no success. Read reviews and it's a know problem. Do not recommend!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great show from the Echo Show
reviews.reviewText: I’m very happy with the Echo Show. Beautiful, big display screen & excellent sound quality. I’m still learning what it can do but so far, so good.
Beware, there is no customer service available for this device or the associated household account relationships. Figure it out on your own, or not
Skip Echo! Buy Google assist instead. Google is much more reliable!

It’s okay. Setup is quick and simple and learning to talk to Alexa takes some time. The problem is that I only use the shoe as an alarm clock and weather. Seems like it has so much more potential. More skills maybe?

I don’t know how I ever lived without this I can’t say her name or she will go off right now but I love watching TV on it at night while my husband is sleeping next to me and with wireless headphones it is perfect.

Overall I like the 2nd Gen Show. Never had the 1st Gen so can't really compare. Compared to our 1st Gen Echo it definitely has better bass/sound. It's still hit/miss getting it to connect to my Ring cameras but hopefully that will get better at some point.

reviews.reviewTitle: Significant improvement after the previous generation
reviews.reviewText: The screen quality, size and integration with the Alexa is very good. However, I have experienced some issues while I`m watching amazon prime videos or youtube. It exists and returns to home screen with no reason. Searching with voice input is difficult. Sometimes, I prefer to spell the letters instead of typing them on screen keyboard or repeating the same thing multiple times. Overall, the big screen with Alexa improves your experience a lot and the features like video chat. Hoping to see more skills that take advantage of the camera and the big screen.
Love both of them. One in kitchen at home and one in kitchen at cabin. Great picture and sound. Ideal for music, news, recipes, everything. Even synced to my Ring doorbell and floodlight cameras.
Overall great item!! Just needs a bit more knowledge in some areas! Like nature-gardening-animals. Certain areas a little behind on. Knows all about celebs and movies!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Full functionality of all devices will cost
reviews.reviewText: I may not be the best person to do the review. I am a bit to technical. I canfigured all the devices through their interfaces to Alexa. I expected Alexa to interface like what Idesign at work. On the otherhand, my 12 year old just talks to Alexa and it does what he wants done.
I really love the sound quality from this device. I do wish that it was able to hear me consistently from the same spot. I wish that there were other voice options and standby clock face options.
I love my new Show- I use it for everything- news, weather, alarm, streaming videos/music; it also let's me know what's on my calendar for the day!!!! Oh, and I make phone calls with the Show too!!!!

The device itself is great. Great sound, screen, quality build, etc. However the UI needs some improvements. Why is the clock so small with no option of making it full screen? Why is the settings menu so limited? Why when this is basically a tablet is there no apps (not talking about Alexa Skills, but apps for just the device)? Hopefully future software updates will improve on all of this and I can rate 5*s because the hardware is great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very nice addition to our kitchen!
reviews.reviewText: Works very well. Concerned about how much Amazon is listening, though. Use it to listen to remote radio stations, keep our grocery list, answer questions, etc.

Love it, but not flawless. A little slower than my echo and dot. Doesn’t hear as well. Phone calls are AMAZING. Need to make the browser and easy to open app. I made cookies while watching Christmas movies on Hulu!!

Does not yet deal gracefully with connectivity issues. Has yet to achieve perfect ui/ux harmony. Should have had the follow you camera of the portal. Does not make full use of the screen, pictures calendars and more could be done better if they would give the intern a half hour to provide input.

Otherwise it is an improvement over the echo.
I am loving my Echo Show. It is so nice to add to a list, check the forecast, play music, etc. and see it all on the screen. I added my personal touches with my pictures. This is so much fun.
I have both the 8 inch and the 10 , love the 10 inch , they both are amazing, would recommend them

reviews.reviewTitle: This device is very powerful and versatile for many uses a quality build device.
reviews.reviewText: A very neat device that can be customized to your likes and needs. I bought the Echo show as the primary monitor for security. This device is so much more. Premium sound and display. It would be nice if it had a battery.

reviews.reviewTitle: It works and is still working after a month of daily use!
reviews.reviewText: I'm really enjoying this Echo Show! Integrated into my already extensive Smart Home and I'm using it for all kinds of things like cooking, answering the Ring Doorbell, etc. Great product!

reviews.reviewTitle: Alexa Show Is A Must Have
reviews.reviewText: Alexa Show combined with Ring Doorbell just added another useful convenience to our lifestyle. It has more features than anyone can imagine. It is a must have for our home.

reviews.reviewTitle: I like it, but I wish it had a built in calendar
reviews.reviewText:
This is a nice device, but it needs more as far as software.
There are apps for calendar but they are clunky, it would be nice if everyday it would automatically show the calendar on the desktop,

I am on my 3rd show and I am still having problems!!! Junk

I now have my fourth show and it seems to be working fine! Fingers crossed!
Absolutely love this. Apple Music and Sirius XM integrate very well, love that you can program a morning and evening routine. So glad we purchased this!

I am enjoying our Alexa Show. I ask it to play songs, find recipes, tell me the weather, answer trivia questions, etc. Is it a Necessity, of course not, but it looks nice, has good sound and is enjoyable to have.
I love it! Love Alexa! Works great with my security system, I can check cameras, lock doors!!

Besides all the things you can do with this newest version, the speaker is what really impressed me the most. I was expecting it to be better, but it really surprised me with just how much better it is tho.
I love it! Like having several products in one. Watch your cameras, listen to music with words, watch movies, look up recipes. It has a million uses.

I use the device to play Amazon music & control home devices (light switches, thermostats, Ring doorbell, sensors).
It has good speakers for the music and supports Alexa compatible home automation. I like the fact it shows the words of some songs when it plays the music (sing along?). It can also read Kindle books, but I haven't tried this yet.

reviews.reviewTitle: i'm loving my new echo show
reviews.reviewText: I love this echo show. i'm new on alexa and still learning the skills and shortcuts. I should've bought this sooner but Im glad I bought it on primeday. saved me tons of $$.
Very good picture and sound.
As an owner of multiple Echo devices I'm pleased with the larger screen and improved sound of the Echo Show G2. Nice benefit that it came basically pre configured for my Amazon account and home wifi.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound quality and love having the screen!!
reviews.reviewText: This is my 6th echo device, and I think it is the best one yet. Love having the screen in the kitchen. Sound quality as excellent. Integrates well with the rest of my network (SmartThings) easily. And the WAF has been excellent.!!

reviews.reviewTitle: An extravagant tool but so nice to have
reviews.reviewText: This item is wonderful in that it is a luxury we have given ourselves. It is not necessary, however, we enjoy the information that can be obtained and the music we cam request be played.
I like the touchscreen, the sound, and it was easy to setup. Not such a fan of the scrolling updates all the time, sometimes ok - not sure if they can be configured to off. But I love the Echo Show!!
Item was great for a while. Then started to malfunction. Now has completely stopped working. Haven't even had it a year. Not happy considering how much it costs.
A little hard to review this product as I just got it a few days ago. I am just learning to use it. I have had a couple of challenges but nothing that couldn’t be overcome. So far I LIKE IT. S

I bought this product to use in India. When I set it up, it is telling me it cannot give me simple information like current movies playing in theaters because the product is registered in USA. I have not registered it in the USA.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great device to connect your smart home devices!
reviews.reviewText: I love the Echo show simply because it helps us a lot at home from having Alexa turn on the AC or set up reminders and even showing the security camera footage. I think the only issue I was having was sometimes it does take at least several times before Alexa can hear me and I would also need to have a high tone of voice even when i’m 5ft close by.

I love my Echo Show. I have it synced with my dot so I can hear my music in multiple rooms. The sound quality is great. I have my pictures scrolling through and like having the screen to view various content. The only reason I am giving this 4 stars vs 5 is because there are times Alexa doesn’t seem to hear me. I don’t have that issue with my dot.
Love this! My daughter has one; needed one too. Love the recipes, info, words to songs, so much capability. Very happy with this purchase. Have the optional stand too.

Bought mostly to "drop in" and talk to my son, daughter-in-law and granddaughters. Works great for that as well as answering questions, giving the weather forecast, showing me recipes. Am still learning about playing music and reading Will be a lot of fun!

I love the echo show gen 2!!!! It’s in my kitchen and I use it for everything! Sound quality is stellar and Alexa is so smart! It has a touch screen so you can surf the web, keep multiple kitchen timers, play movies, whatever. This is my favorite house gadget!!! Thanks Amazon!
Love this one in my kitchen....still just scratching the surface on what this product can do and having a blast!!!! Recipes, music, phone calls, news, shopping lists, to do list.....all hands free.

reviews.reviewTitle: After trying the first gen, the second gen is a keeper, but just barely.
reviews.reviewText: My primary complaint about the first gen Show was the horrible touchscreen display. The only way to see photographs clearly was to view it straight on. Any movement to off-angle resulted in a washed out mess. The second gen is only slightly better in that regard to the first gen. It still has an annoying wash-out appearance when viewed off angle, but the angle appears to be a bit wider. This is likely due to the larger dimensions of the display, and not any change to the underlying display technology. For the display tech nerds out there, this is very likely an edge-lit TN type LCD (ie the worst of the worst for image quality) If you're expecting an IPS or OLED and would be disappointed with anything as low quality as a TN type then you might as well skip this device. The sound quality, however, is much better in my opinion. The base is deeper for sure. Because of the improved sound alone I decided to overlook the screen deficiencies and keep it. It still makes a good Echo device and the best alarm clock you could possibly purchase right now.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product if it didn’t lag,skip, or freeze
reviews.reviewText: Freezes a lot and can’t do much with it, would recommend either the normal echo or the google home.
Great product with awesome sound quality. The bass is super and the sound feels the room easily without being at max volume. Definitely recommended
I upgraded from the echo plus to this echo show and I’m really glad I did. Having a screen makes a big difference in how you can utilize Alexa.

I purchased this many to use as an clock beside my bed as they have choosing to make the time SO SMALL it can NOT be seem more than a foot away total waste of my money, so it sits collecting dust as it is of NO use to me.
Great upgrade from my Alexa. Nice to see words of songs on the screen and to be able to watch Amazon Prime Videos. Nice size screen and easy set up.
The sound is amazing! Alexa is like Siri, she sometimes gets things wrong but hopefully that will work itself out the more she gets used to us

I also have a Echo Dot in my home (Costa Rica) which has several Spanish versions (Mexico, Spain) but the Echo Show only has the Spanish from Spain which has different meanings and difficult to follow. Also, most of the announcements which pop up in the screen are about Spain which is not useful for me. Is there any way to add the Spanis from Mexico, similar to what the other device has as a language option?

Regards,

The sound and spatial effect is superb
Great bass, crisp highs, 3 band eq and amazing quality sound, and the big screen is tablet sized!
We have only had it for a short time so haven't really played with everything it can do. I'll write another review after we have had it for awhile.
Bought another one of these for my father, he loves the echo show, just wanted the newer one because of the better sound, bigger screen, and the ability to play hulu.

I traded my Echo Show Gen-1 in for this Gen-2 but had to send it back to Amazon and get my Gen-1 back. The New Echo would not connect to my Joey (Dish Network) box for sound. I tried the 2nd generation units twice but neither one of them would connect to the Joey for sound. Bought another Echo Gen-1 and it works great for the connection for sound to the Dish Joey box. I would be willing to get the Gen-2 again, once the Bluetooth bug is fixed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Larger screen. Alexa does not have all the info Siri does though.
reviews.reviewText: I love the product. My husband keeps it in the kitchen for recipes. The recipes stays on the screen and doesn’t disappear. The only thing I don’t like is my 7 year old granddaughter drops in at different times using her moms. I need to stop access when I go to sleep.

I purchased this just because it was prime day but when it arrived I was blown away. It takes the place of surround sound in my living room. I have no complaints! It has much better voice recognition than my spot also!

Very cool device. As an echo dot user I was pleased with the upgraded experience of having video. Some of my favorite skills, like Jeopardy, make good use of the screen. I also like being able to watch streaming videos from Amazon. The sound quality is also excellent.

For such a compact device, I was impressed with not only the picture quality but the sound quality as well. To me, the bass was pretty impressive. Have this tied into our Ring devices and really enjoy the convenience that comes along with that.

I really do like this device. I got it to sing along with music, but not all music has lyrics. The song I specifically wanted doesn't have lyrics. Darn. I also wanted to watch my dish anywhere on the device and the Echo Show is not compatible. Double Darn.
Love this in my kitchen. Volume can get very loud. Great to add music & look up recipes during my cooking or morning outline. & you can personalize the display screen with your favorite picture.

Wow this is my 3rd echo device. This show 2 is absolutely amazing. There are so many things you can do with it. I would definitely recommend the show. I don’t write reviews very much but this is an A+

Big screen is beautiful but makes me want to touch it more for some reason. Obviously this does not do much and you have to mainly use just voice control. Maybe Amazon will fix this and make touch a equal citizen on Alexa.

reviews.reviewTitle: Thank you Amazon for helping people
reviews.reviewText: with disabilities. You have improved my quality of life in sooo many ways. Please don’t stop trying to tweak any bugs that there may be for people really need these products:)

Received this Echo Show gen 2 as a gift. At first I didn't know what I was going to do with it until I started playing with it. Unbalieveable the things you can do. The sound quality when listening to music is excellent.

reviews.reviewTitle: Makes having to be in the kitchen tolerable. (LOL!)
reviews.reviewText: Love this thing! I can watch TV, music videos, make video calls, etc. when in the kitchen, folding laundry, etc. Has exceptional sound!!! Very cool little gadget.
Alexa won’t do anything. But today all of a sudden she’s playing Pandora music. Couldn’t get her to stop so had to turn off.
This device works very well and is functional in several ways. We use it everyday and the grandchildren love seeing the lyrics to the music.

My brother-in-law bought this for our family as a gift, so that he and his family can keep in touch with us. It was not something we were looking to purchase, but it has been a lovely surprise. We have face-timed our family several times now, and Alexa is great with any questions, recipes, and for my 6-year old, pictures of anything she can imagine!

reviews.reviewTitle: All the different music I can request.
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know why I waited so long to buy one! I love it. I love music and I do now is tell Alexia what to play. She sets my timers and alarms for me too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastic way to stay in touch
reviews.reviewText: I sent to my grandson who lives in another state. Now we can see one another and really converse sharing our days and stories. What great technology!!
The transition between skills (apps for Alexa) is much slower than expected. I asked her if she had software updates and she didn’t know.

reviews.reviewTitle: Doesn't do what it is told; inconsistent functioning
reviews.reviewText:
Sometimes it will follow simple commands that work on other Alexa-enabled devices (echo, dot, etc), sometimes it won't. Needs to be rebooted frequently. The other day it decided it needed to show me a picture of the world's ugliest dog in the morning as I was getting ready for work; not really the way I like to start my day.

Like many tech hardware and software, this product was shipped without proper product testing.

reviews.reviewTitle: Really like the all new Echo Show (2nd Generation)
reviews.reviewText: Already had the first Echo Show but were excited when a bigger screen version became available. Still use it the same as the older model but really enjoy the bigger screen.
I'm still getting use to it, so my opinion may change once I get used to it.. I've had issues figuring out what voice commands work.

This is my second echo show 2nd gen. And I also have the 1st gen as well. I liked very much the improved sound and the fact that it’s a smart hub and I use it to switch off all the lights in my bedroom when I go to sleep. Some of the voice controls are still not as intuitive as I would like but so far so good. I tried all the smart speakers but at this point in time, this is the best so far.
The speakers in this is amazing. The video quality is great. The only issue is the normal Alexa issues and the skills it can lack.

reviews.reviewTitle: Well worth the upgrade from gen 1
reviews.reviewText: The sound is spectacular for my office and kitchen space. The Alexa functionality is good as always and the larger, clearer screen is better on my eyes. Combine this with a prime membership and you have a great combo

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent for the kitchen and dining room
reviews.reviewText: We have a 1st gen echo, an echo Dot and now this new show. The echo and echo show are in the same large space and linked together to play music, etc. The new, larger screen and better audio is excellent.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does exactly what I need it to do
reviews.reviewText: Love that it syncs with my Ring doorbell and I love that it has the lyrics to my songs that we play. It's like having our very own Karoake machine!

reviews.reviewTitle: Very Happy with my Echo Show
reviews.reviewText: So happy to have my own Echo Show! Really envied the one my sister-in-law had and finally decided it was time to get one for us. It's so cool! We got the echo dot at the same time and so glad we did. I can see us adding smart home features in the future.
I love this product! It is amazing. I use it to watch my shows while cooking and it works great. It is very loud. The screen isn't super sensitive but it is ok. The picture is great. I love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as advertised- stops working after a week
reviews.reviewText: Product used to work great - we got it to video chat with my parents so they could see their grand kids and a video player in the kitchen. After 1 week and a factory reset the videos just stopped playing. The show would recognize and say it was going to play, but nothing would happen! Imagine a 3 year old and 18 month old waiting patiently- nope! I am thinking of returning this product as this is a severe disappointment!

reviews.reviewTitle: It's slow, and not feature packed
reviews.reviewText: I mean, for the price, I would expect snappy performance and more features! Guard mode doesn't work on this thing, and I can't make the clock full screen.
Exactly what I was looking for! Easy to use and handy. Works very well to get the information I need and I like the size of the screen. Great product!

reviews.reviewTitle: Hard finding things it is helpful with
reviews.reviewText:
The others guys is more useful
I finally gave up.
Shut it down and boxed it up.
It was never able to locate things near my house.
Very very frustrating.
Amazon set up an appointment to talk to me and has never returned the call.
Really awesome product! Just haven’t used it much since not many others have one and I’m not sure all that it can really do to be honest.

Love that on some songs Alexa will scroll the lyrics. Love that Alexa will slideshow your photos if you ask her. Love that the Facetime calls are so visually clear. Love the "Let's Chat" function. Setup was easy. No problems after two months.
Do not buy this! This is my second one in 3 months the first one quit just out of my return window and the second 1 lasted only a week and a half!!!

I have an echo show the first generation, and the screen size and sound quality of the 2 is way better. The voice recognition is amazing, I can be in another room and it can hear me. I am very happy with the echo show 2, and would recommend it to anyone
Great sound on my tile counter top. Works all Alexa stuff. Don’t care about the scrolling info, wish I could make it do more. It’s not a tablet by any stretch.

I dont know how I used to live without Alexa Echo Show, right now I have everything connected to the Alexa echo 2, front door lock, camera,light everywhere kitchen living room, robot vacuum cleaner, microwave, TV, etc.
Echo Show 2 Big screen, Sound just WOW
I'm really enjoying this device. The sound quality is amazing. The base makes it sound like a much bigger stereo.

Love that I can now just ask to see my door bell cam and security cams. I really wish I could change the default screen to say the weather or one of my cameras, maybe in a future upgrade? Great product, keep it up Amazon!
I now have 4 of these, 2 with the subs. Excellent sound quality and voice recognition. It also has some pretty cool skills!
Great product, much better sound and clear screen. Big improvement over previous model.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great and Much Improved Echo Show 2
reviews.reviewText: The new Echo Show is a great and much improved version over the first version of the Echo Show. Better and larger screen, better speakers and easier setup. My wife loves it. Well worth it.

We love the Echo Show. Simple to set up and use. Easy to follow instructions. Love the large screen. Following recipes is now a breeze. We’ve used the drop in feature a few times and it works great. I know we still have a lot to learn about what it can do. But love it so far.
I love this device. Alexa is super responsive and easy to use. There are games for adults and children. The display is great. Videos play very well. All around a great purchase.
This new show is a good improvement over the 1st model. The larger screen is sharper and easier to read the text. The speakers are much better. Thank you Amazo for upgrading this device.
Glitches constantly. Randomly starts playing music. Video drop-ins are worthless and I know it's not our internet. Not worth the money.
I have received 2 of these and both times right as I open the box there is no sound. Not the quality I expect from Amazon

reviews.reviewTitle: Sound is very bass-y, will not play iphone streams
reviews.reviewText:
the device in itself is great. Coming from the spot, this is a huge improvement. It replaces the central audio for streaming, but only after a lot of messing around with the audio settings. The bass is to heavy for such a small device. If you like that, you will love this thing.

I have an issue playing streams/music from the iphone XS. The show tells me it's connected, but i have no sound.
Have the Echo Dot and got the Echo Show to use the display. Works great in the kitchen.
Great video, sound and the best part is the built in hub. All devices work perfectly. I had the Show 1.0 and upgraded to this. Very much worth it.
This Alexa was a gift to myself. Just a fun thing. Actually the weather forecast called for 5 -6" of snow overnight. Alexa told me yesterday it would only be 0.5" and by Jove she was correct.
This is different level cool!

The Echo Show Gen 2 is a great improvement over Gen 1. The new version is big enough to watch Prime Video and the sound in tremendous. I bought the new stand with it and I'm glad I did. Everything about this is so much better than Gen 1.
Does everything we want. Had the gen 1 and the lack of multitasking made us return it. Our Gen 2 gets used daily as a kitchen screen, recipes, Tv, music, I love this one.

Not only does this gadget have a colorful screen (that updates with new info everyday), but it has amazing sound. Play songs from Amazon music and you'll be hooked. Also, the "drop in" feature works well.
My security camera and music. It keeps losing connection and you can only use it for Amazon music and movies and on top of that some music won’t play if you don’t have amazon unlimited
It sounds like a background echo. It’s so old school and outdated for it to sound this terrible . It’s very bad. What happened. Way too much base

I like the ears in setting up this Amazon echo show and the great grandchildren love asking him questions jokes and also to play music that they like our granddaughter is going to have one tomorrow and we will be able to call and give you each other on this echo show
The screen is much bigger and looks just beautiful. The sound is amazing, just an all around wonderful upgrade from the 1st generation Echo 👍

reviews.reviewTitle: If you like echo and Alexa, get this.
reviews.reviewText: Wow what a great sound. Shows video great. Nice auto sim at night. Easy to see across a room. 2 way video works great. Really impresd with this.
Love the size of the screen and the quality of sound. Integration with Apple Music has been great and was one of the driving factors behind us getting the show.

I absolutely love this device! It's convenient and there are so many features and apps that fit my personal life it's awesome! I don't need to strain my eyes by searching for music, movies, books and so much more! I must not forget that the sound quality and picture clarity is well worth it!
It’s great to have a bigger screen plus the awesome audio completes the package. I’d like to see swivel under cabinet mounts for my wife.
Love the video calling, bought it solely for that purpose, then secondly for its expandability. The sound on the 2nd Gen WAY better, good job, love playing music on it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound and super easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Amazon has done it again. This model outperforms the first gen. It's best in the Kitchen.. (in my opinion)
I was slow to get in on the Alexa bandwagon until I received the Echo Show. Now I am looking for different ways to make the device useful. It can be very helpful!
I have hardly used it for a week, but soon got a message from xfinity plan that more than 500Gb data consumed in a few days. No streaming, no video just a few voice commands!

We've had the Echo Dots for a few years, and this has been a nice upgrade. My 10-year-old grandson is autistic, and it helps him to 'talk' to Alexa. With the screen, he is able to read along with some of the conversations he has with her. Of course, I love it for the ease of reading recipes, the news, the Hulu shows, etc., but it is especially helpful for my grandson.

I was hesitant to jump into home automation however after using it for a week or so, I love it. Even my wife who's very much non technical is loving it. I'm sure we're just scratching the surface of what it can do.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bigger, brighter screen and better sound than 1st Gen.
reviews.reviewText: Our 3 month old grandchild is 3000 miles away but with this device (and its predecessor) we get to see him weekly. If it could stream CNBC and CNN live it would replace the kitchen TV.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great device for all around smart home
reviews.reviewText: So far love it! Sound is great and picks up my voice when I talk at a low level from accross the room. Pair my new sengel bulbs to it very quickly with no other hub required and my new ring doorbell.

Love our echo show. It does so much. My grandson loves to have Alexa tell him jokes, my husband's listens to his music on it. We also have the Phillip's bulb and its nice to walk into a dark house and have Alexa turn the light on.
Good sound, crisp screen, plenty of bass. Controls a lot of devices. Alexa, not so smart. Can’t answer basic questions and has issues with certain commands

reviews.reviewTitle: Don't Buy Unless they fix this Sound Issue!
reviews.reviewText: I recieved the Echo Show on July 17, 2019. It has been working ok and has some great features, but it just stopped playing sound. Something this expensive shouldn't stop working within 1.5 months. It also has trouble recognizing commands at times. Right now it is a glorified paperweight without sound. Frustrating!!!
Love this! I wish I had bought one sooner! It's so nice to control the lights in my apartment with voice command. It can hear me two rooms away.

We like the ease of video chatting with the grandkids (We bought them one as well.)
We also use the news recaps and the radio apps quite a bit. I am exploring what other devices make since for our home. Right now I'm checking out the Wyze Cam's that came in our Show bundles.
I use the echo show for captions which includes what Alexia says, but Alexa captions are not available for everything she says.

Lots of issues right out of the box to include no audio and poor voice recognition. Worked better after a reset but stopped working again about a month later. Returned and a new one is on the way, hopefully it works better. Alexa app needs some work as well, it is not very intuitive.
I love love my alexia echo, far out does anything I expected. My only problem is I should have purchased it sooner!
This is my second Echo Show and I really like the larger screen. With the speakers in back the sound is not as good as the original.

I love my Echo Show 2 - bought one for me and one as a gift. I am going to start buying more as gifts. The sound quality is superb. I love jeopardy and all the other games. Charting with friends and distant relatives is awesome! Another home run for Amazon!
We have Alexa in every room of our house. I bought the new Echo Show for my kitchen and love it. The screen is much bigger then the first one. Sound is awesome.

reviews.reviewTitle: I watch movies and listen to all types of music.
reviews.reviewText: I wonder each day how I got by without it. The sound is fantastic. It is rather hard to learn the different things you want to use it for. There are no good directions.
I absolutely love the Echo Show. It has a great large screen that I have used for watching videos, recipes, and my security cameras. I am actually considering getting another!
The audio on this device is top notch, much to our surprise. Love the screen aspect, allowing to view recipes easily, watch music videos, etc. We love this device.

reviews.reviewTitle: I enjoy using this echo show.
reviews.reviewText: I can now "face time" my brother (we both have an echo), even though we have two different phones. We both down loaded the app to our respective phones and gave echo access to our contact list. It was easy to set up. I enjoy using it for music also.
Cool features. Love the drop in feature. We have one on all three levels of the house. Saves your voice from yelling. Also, my wife loves that most songs scroll with the lyrics on the screen.
Can't access you tube and can't physically search for apps on the unit if for some reason Alexa isn't understanding you.
Love that I can tell it to play any song or songs by any artist and it does! Also like to ask about the weather, use it as a timer and alarm. It is a great toy!

reviews.reviewTitle: Over heats in 68 degree room temperature
reviews.reviewText: Everything works great. Sound quality could use a little tweeter to not make it sound like a cheap portable speaker. And everytime I'm listing to music it says over heating and to shut it off. Thinking of returning it.

reviews.reviewTitle: The Echo Show has a great picture and fabulous sound!
reviews.reviewText: We love the Echo Show! The screen is very vibrant and clear. The sound is wonderful. Using Alexa is so easy. We can't wait to call the grandkids on it!
My whole family likes it, just call Alexa, on everything, you will get the answer, it even shows the visitor at my doorstep when paired with Ring doorbell

We have a lot of echo dots and the fire TV. It was really nice to know that when I say Alexa it doesn't over power the other devices and can filter out what I am talking too. It also has shown me options I can do on my fire tv that I did not know I could do. When it comes to the smart home system, it shown me switches which gives me more individualized control. It also has great picture to use our cloud cam as a baby monitor.

Echo plays an important part of my life now can’t live without it! This version does give a good quality sound and a bigger screen, the screen sit closer to the table floor so depending on your situation you might have to lift it or use a stand.
Great Sound!!!.. Nice, beautiful screen!!! Few apps to work with. I wish it did more. It has amazing potential, yes, potential.
I absolutely love my Echo Show! I placed it in t he kitchen so I can watch rv, listen to music etc while cooking. Sound is great! I highly recommend this product.

We love the generation 2. We listen to music (fabulous sounding), watch pictures we’ve taken .. look who’s at the front door with Ring doorbell. Ask questions for search. But she doesn’t know everything. Love the bigger screeen!
some lag when asking and responding, having trouble uploading photos there is no option in the app anymore.
I had two echo shows and decided to order this newer model on prime day due to a much better price. Screen and sound much improved.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy To Set Up and Use
reviews.reviewText: Works great! Finding new ways to use it every day for music and household activities like timers. Love that I can talk to my grandchildren and follow their activities.

The sound is excellent, learning how to use skills, everyday there is something new I learn that it can help with. We set alarms, play music, ask it questions. Great product. I'm not a techy but it is easy to set up.

reviews.reviewTitle: its great the things you can learn
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about my Echo Show, how clear the picture and sound are, the quickness she answers my questions, the weather reports so far it has been all great, The entire family enjoys asking it questions It is worth the price.

I bought these for my children’s families. Alexa is loved by all the kids. They ask her questions and get answers. We video chat and the sound of the music she plays is clear and crisp. Love our Echo Shows.
Needs voice searchable YouTube. That is all.

reviews.reviewTitle: Alexa Echo Show, great and engaging for people with dementia
reviews.reviewText: I am the customers Caregiver. I had her daughter purchase the Echo Show for her mother due to early stage of dementia. A great tool for my client, typed Alexa commands and she uses it a few times a day. This , she says makes he4 very happy. She lives alone and was very quiet. Now she turns on her Echo Show, plays music on Spotify, movies on Hulu and reminders. A great giftt to keep in mind, if you have a friend or family with this condition.
Excellent device for viewing on Ring. The sound is great and the viewing is the same. I wish that it was a more versatile device as a tablet but it is a well made device.
* update: Found Silk so now I think the Echo Show/2nd gen not only has a great sound system for listening to music (and watching movies) but it does a lot more, including searching online.
Better than the basic echo. Cool seeing the songs lyrics on the screen when you say”Alexa play Hotel California”. Ask for the weather and it gives you a 5 day forcaste. Step by step video for cooking
I love love this echo show! The size is nice and the base is amazing!!! The camera is very clear and nice when you drop in on people
Alexa with a display works great! I love how I can display my photos I uploaded to Amazon Photo cloud. My kids love it too. They used it to watch Amazon Prime videos. Good stuffs.
Amazon Alexa is awesome! Hope they improve the personal photo display and make it more user friendly and setup to fill the whole screen.

Sometimes the sound does not work. I finally figured out you have to unplug it from the Echo not the wall to reset.
Should not have to do this. So if you want to take it to another room or outside, you have to unplug it and restart.
So much more than just a radio. She sets alarms, shows me my photo albums and even tells me a joke from time to time.
Much better sound, but Alexis seems to have a much more difficult time recognizing when she’s being talked to, compared to the older models.

I was a little hesitant at first but so glad I bought it! I love that you can watch videos and the sound quality is amazing. One of my favorite features is that it will show song lyrics while the song is playing. Would make a great gift too!

Had issues with Screen Flickering on 1st Gen, so we ordered new ones. Bigger screen. Bigger sound. Ultimately works the same as the 1st gen, regarding the user interface, but overall it's more enjoyable to use because of the larger screen. Playing music and movies on here is a better experience due to the audio improvements. Much deeper base and gets much louder. Overall, I'm impressed with this 2nd Gen unit over the 1st gens.
I really enjoy the Echo Show! The screen rotates through new screens and is well integrated into our existing Alexa system. A good edition to our household.
It's very limited and heavy. It doesn't understand me and it's hard to set up. Apps all seem to be down.
Doesn’t play Netflix, the Ring skill is buggy, plays alerts on all devices in every state! No good. Who else is listening?
I love everything about this project. Probably its best feature is the new screen size. Video is crystal clear and sound is excellent! Probably one of my favorite Amazon purchases.

reviews.reviewTitle: A major improvement to the Echo “Show”
reviews.reviewText: Significant improvement in sound, picture size and format - and clarity and brilliance. But get it with the stand so you can make the angle perfect from any shelf or table surface.

reviews.reviewTitle: no sound. read if you want to fix the issue
reviews.reviewText: product has flaw. they don't tell you about sound disappear when power goes off or accidently unplug the unit. from the wall outlet. Only way to bring sound back is unplug power cord from back of the unit. This is sound wired to me but works. Power adaptor has some power left in it???? That has to be programming glitch. It happen several times at beginning. They may have upgraded program since then,

I own Amazon Echo for about a month and love it. I love the fact that I can listen to music and watch the prime movie without lifting a finger. I can ask questions and find the answers easily by asking Alexa. It's been a great companion in the kitchen while I cook, eat, and talk with family. It's not Bose, but the sound quality is fairly good.

reviews.reviewTitle: An excellent upgrade to an already excellent device....
reviews.reviewText: Excellent device all around. I had to take a star off due to the fact it does not have a native youtube app.

Easy setup and fun for the whole family. Love the video call and intercom functions along with everything else. Connected easily to wifi light bulbs and security cameras and with the phone app feature I can control the home from anywhere. LOVE IT

The price was the best I’ve seen for this product at $179.99. Works as advertised and the video call feature is a nice alternative to Apples FaceTime. The speaker is better than I would have anticipated and has a clear bass sound.

reviews.reviewTitle: I am happy with the gen 2 Echo Show
reviews.reviewText: This Echo Show Gen 2 is great. As of the time of this review, I have only had it for a day but it was easy to set up and integrate with all of my other Amazon smart devices.
I love our Echo Show. The audio quality is amazing. The screen is beautiful and high definition. We’ve already bought our second. A Must Have!

reviews.reviewTitle: The only woman in my life that listens to me.
reviews.reviewText: This is the best money I spent since that new butt cream that tightens everything up and gives me back my Speedo body.

(Waiting impatiently for the shower skill.) This review sure isn't going to give you any actual instructions on how to use the hardware. There's a learning curve. But the honest truth is, I have been waiting for this all of my life. Alexa and I, (my teens, my husband as well...), are having so much fun! A whole new world awaits. Highly recommended. ;-)

reviews.reviewTitle: Not sure why I love them, but I do.
reviews.reviewText: These gadgets have so much potential. I feel like Amazon is holding back on us. The sound is great, but they just don't do enough. Oh I know what it is....they have skills, but they can't run Apps! They need to be able to run apps. Yep, that's what it is.

reviews.reviewTitle: 2nd Gen Show is like putting the 1st Gen Show on steroids.
reviews.reviewText: OMG! What an improvement over our old Amazon Show. Don’t get me wrong, we love our 1 Generation Show, but the screen size and better speakers make the new Show better.

reviews.reviewTitle: Besides that I love it Still!!
reviews.reviewText: I love it!! I use it for shopping list, My calendar is linked to it so it lets me know what’s going on that day. I just wish you could use apps like Pinterest and other ones for better recipes. Yes need Hulu live to watch TV.
I would recommend the newer Echo Show to everyone as it so much better, if you have the older model you should upgrade, you will not be disappointed.
I love my Echo Show. I have never had an Echo or any device like this, and am so glad I got the Show right away. I love having the screen to view videos/recipes/whatever.

This device does nothing that you can't do yourself. Probably a great product for the mobility impaired. However, it directs you to more Amazon products, more money for Amazon. Performs little free tasks other than turning on lights or inquiring about the weather. Save your money and look up the weather on your laptop,

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound and picture, but a little slow
reviews.reviewText: Amazing sound, although it's a tad bass heavy for my liking. It's very surprising how loud and clear this gets. I love the screen. It is vibrant and responsive. The OS itself seems to be slow, though, which is why I took one star away. It seems like it could be much faster than it is.

I have many Alexa devices, and really liked the original show quite a bit. The addition of the video was such a huge improvement over the original devices. I had to try this new Show (2nd Gen) as my biggest concern with the original Show was that the screen was too small for kitchen/living room use. I have two major issues with the screen:

A. It seems to sense ambient light (or knows the time of day and operates from that) and adjusts the brightness. The problem is that it is not bright enough in low light making it hard to see. There should be a manual brightness adjustment available as well as an automatic mode.

B. The clock is too small and impossible to read from a distance. The digital clock should have a multiple size option from current size to full screen. Also a twelve hour clock and an analog clock display would be nice.

In general, the Echo Show may have a number of display options, but I'm not sure they are really useful. Why watch a movie on the 10" screen when the big TV with better quality video and sound is nearby. I do like the seven day weather display. One of the nicest features (also available on all Echo devices) is the "drop in" and "announce" feature turning all the Echos into an intercom system throughout the house. Overall, I'm not sure it's worth the money given its limited use.
